18.18: apg-saa-lom Zxg yem seij zavg uaq zang, ninb yem huvb hxvd weig ninb kanb lyepg nxm la'pyeib tovg zruj Javb hog, weig zu'g ninb kxvq, “yia maiq maaib txn Ripg yia Eei Buaj.” ninb Zwrtq la'pyeib tovg Eei Buaj heug apg-saa-lom ei ninb kanb Eei Buaj. myenb yaag heug apg-saa-lom Eei Javb hog Tauj ib Jaaj Nxi.
18.8: uaq Nxi Bx'q Jaaj Eei sig Raanj mivb pwavq uaq teij txvj Eei Dau. taig uaq lomg Eei myenb kaub Zamq zu'g Ru'g Daauq taij uaq teij.
18.33: huvb tiaj Hruq mun tu'q Do haig. ninb faauj zivb kcvb kub vwaaig Eei yetg Qovj Eyemq. ninb yetg ping mivb yetg ping kxvq, “o yia Eei txn, apg-saa-lom aag, yia Eei txn, yia Eei txn, apg-saa-lom. feij tu'q yia tu'q taig tiq meib. yia Eei txn, yia Eei txn, apg-saa-lom aa'b!”
18.3: mq paag ninb Eei pcv kxvq, “meib maiq tuvq mivb. sij kxvq yia Bua xij zu'g pyauj, ninb Bua funj yia Bua maiq lovg Jyenq. maiq kunq yia Bua zu'g taig yetg pwrng, ninb Bua yaag maiq funj yia Bua Dovg haaij lovg Jyenq. mq paag huvb tiaj kaub Jaaij yia Bua yetg waang taub. meib yem Jyenq zivb ka'Euad liug leid Tevj yia Bua se kaub lovj.”
18.32: huvb tiaj naaig Kutq myenb “uaq taub myenb lunj myenb, apg-saa-lom, lovj Eei fai?” Kutq myenb tau, “Toq pun yia Eei zyruq, huvb tiaj, Eei winb wavq Zauj yetg zuvq Jiad taaib xij hxig huvb tiaj uaq teij, Navq uaq taub myenb lunj myenb.”
18.21: yo-aapg zyrug kxvq Buaj taub Kutq myenb, “mivb a'q. ziuj meib pwatg Eei mivb Buaj huvb tiaj.” Kutq myenb yem yo-aapg Eei Ra'Myen Do'q Fiag liud, zyrug Tiuj mivb mig a'q.
18.14: yo-aapg kxvq, “yia maiq xij Zauj meib kwavg zyavb hog.” yo-aapg zyrug nanq Jyenq pua tiub Zavb navq Ropq pia'g apg-saa-lom Eei Ba'Riu, tovb apg-saa-lom yem Ba'ov zwei Dyavj Zxg maaib mcvg Eei zyavb hog.
18.23: aa-hi-maa-atg kxvq, “Navq haaij yaag paag, yia xij Tiuj mivb!” yo-aapg kxvq, “uaq Euvg meib Tiuj mivb a'q maa'b!” aa-hi-maa-atg zyrug kan Daub pcvb Eei Jauq Tiuj Jiaj Daavg Kutq myenb.
18.6: Daa-witq Eei Junb pcv Zwrtq mivb Zauj i-saa-laa-en Eei pcv Bx'q Jaaj. ninb Bua yem e-faa-im Eei lomg Bx'q.
18.2: Daa-witq yaag Paaiq Junb pcv Zwrtq mivb, pun zruj pua kwanb. yo-aapg kunq yetg kwanb, sej-lu-yaa Eei txn, yo-aapg Eei yrud, aa-Bi-Qai, kunq yetg kwanb, katg myenb, itg-Tai, yaag kunq yetg kwanb. Daa-witq Buaj ninb Eei pcv, “yia kanb zuvq Zauj meib Bua mivb.”
18.20: yo-aapg kxvq Buaj ninb, “ib Nxi meib maiq tuvq txb haiq Euvg fyenj mivb Buaj. kanb nxm Nxi meib txb mivb tu'q Eei, mq paag ib Nxi maiq tuvq txb weig zu'g huvb tiaj Eei txn taig mig a'q.”
18.24: uaq zang Daa-witq zweid Jyenq ka'Euad Zauj ka'Eiag Eei zivb kcvb Bu'Dovj. syruq kcv myenb faauj zuaq kcvb Eei laaub kub vwaaig. Zau Myen mavg ninb pwatg maaib yetg taub myenb kanb Tiuj Jyenq taaib Navq.
18.28: aa-hi-maa-atg heug Jyenq Buaj huvb tiaj, “pcvb xn a'q og.” ninb zyrug yem huvb tiaj Eei Ra'Myen Pua'q Fiag Myen Tauj Dau kxvq, “Zev zyruq, meib Eei Tinb huvb, weig zu'g ninb zx'q tovb suv puad hxig yia Eei zyruq, huvb tiaj, uaq teij myenb Jiu pun huvb tiaj mig a'q.”
18.7: yem naaig i-saa-laa-en myenb swei Daa-witq Eei Jyen. uaq Nxi zu'g taij taig Eei myenb Zamq! haig, zuvq maaib i waang taub.
18.29: huvb tiaj naaig, “uaq taub myenb lunj myenb, apg-saa-lom, yem lovj Eei fai?” aa-hi-maa-atg tau, “meib Eei pru, yo-aapg, Paaiq yia taaib uaq zang, yia pwatg myenb Zamq Dutg taaj Dutg Eei, mq paag maiq hiuq tu'q maaib haiq Euvg sig Zwrtq.”
18.19: saaj-Dokg Eei txn, aa-hi-maa-atg kxvq, “Toq pun yia Tiuj mivb txb fyenj mivb Buaj huvb tiaj, zyruq Fruj huvb tiaj pyauj Dutq ninb Eei winb wavq mig a'q.”
18.17: ninb Bua zx'q apg-saa-lom Eei sei tapq nxm yem uaq lomg Eei tomb! Kwrtq yaag zx'q la'pyeiq Dwi Jyenq penj yetg tomb! Dwi la'pyeiq. i-saa-laa-en Eei zwavj myenb, kx'g myenb pyauj Rwrnj kx'g myenb Eei pyauq.
18.31: uaq zang Kutq myenb taaib Tauj a'q. Kutq myenb kxvq, “maaib Kuq fyenj Buaj yia Eei zyruq, huvb tiaj, weig zu'g ib Nxi zyruq Fruj huvb tiaj pyauj Dutq yetg zuvq xij hxig huvb tiaj uaq teij.”
18.30: huvb tiaj kxvq, “mivb sruq Jyenq uaq ka'Len.” ninb zyrug Twij mivb ka'Len sruq tivg Eei.
18.27: syruq kcv myenb kxvq, “yia pwatg Tiuj taaib Daavg uaq taub Tiuj Navq saaj-Dokg Eei txn, aa-hi-maa-atg.” huvb tiaj kxvq, “ninb se Kuq myenb yaag txb Kuq fyenj taaib.”
18.11: yo-aapg Buaj tovb txb fyenj taaib Buaj ninb uaq taub, “meib pwatg ninb? uaq Euvg meib weig haiq tiug maiq Va'q ninb Dxtq Fiag Dau taaib? yia a'Neiq zx'q zyepg nxm zinb Zauj tiub hrub Laav zruj zivb Eeig pun meib.”
18.5: huvb tiaj Paaiq yo-aapg, aa-Bi-Qai Zauj itg-Tai, “weig yia nx, Toq hevb hev zruj pun uaq taub myenb lunj myenb, se apg-saa-lom.” huvb tiaj Jaa waag kxvq apg-saa-lom Eei Jauq Buaj ninb Eei pcvb pyeiq uaq zang, zwavj myenb yaag haid mig a'q.
18.9: zruj kau, apg-saa-lom lyemb zeib pwavb zu'g Daa-witq Eei Jyen. uaq zang apg-saa-lom keb Jyenq lxb. lxb yavb tomb Ba'ov zwei Dyavj ka'Diaq Jiaj, apg-saa-lom Eei mGxvq fapq zu'g Dyavb Gwaab. lxb mivb mig a'q. ninb kanb Diuj Jyenq maiq Tauj luvb, maiq Tauj Dau Eei.
18.16: yo-aapg zyrug pyomq Jxv zruj Javb hog pun pcv Rwrnj taaib, maiq zung i-saa-laa-en myenb a'q.
18.4: huvb tiaj kxvq, “meib Bua pwatg haiq Euvg hxpg, yia zyrug Navq uaq nx zruj.” huvb tiaj zyrug sruq Jyenq zivb kcvb Daavg. zwavj Junb pcv Zwrtq mivb penj yetg kwanb, yetg kwanb. yetg kwanb maaib yetg pc'q taub fai yetg Zin taub.
18.10: maaib taub myenb pwatg zyrug Buaj yo-aapg, “yia pwatg apg-saa-lom Diuj Jyenq tomb Ba'ov zwei Dyavj.”
18.22: saaj-Dokg Eei txn, aa-hi-maa-atg, cvj kxvq Buaj yo-aapg, “Navq haaij yaag paag, Toq pun yia kan Kutq myenb mivb.” yo-aapg kxvq, “yia Eei txn aag, meib xij Tiuj mivb zruj haiq Euvg? weig zu'g meib Buaj naaiq teij fyenj maiq maaib zivb Eeig pun meib.”
18.12: mq paag uaq taub myenb tau yo-aapg, “maiq kunq yia Eei puad nanq yetg Zin nxm zinb, yia yaag maiq suv puad hxig huvb tiaj Eei txn, weig zu'g yia Bua tu'q haid huvb tiaj hatg meib Zauj aa-Bi-Qai Zauj itg-Tai. ninb kxvq, ‘weig yia Toq kruj uaq taub myenb lunj myenb, apg-saa-lom.’
18.15: maaib zyepg taub myenb lunj myenb, tovb txb yo-aapg Bx'q Jaaj Eei ua'g king, weib Jyenq apg-saa-lom taij ninb taig a'q.
18.13: mq paag sij kxvq yia hxig ninb Eei mcvg, (yaag maiq maaib haiq Euvg pivj tu'q huvb tiaj Jyenq) meib kanb yaag maiq haib peu maiq tu'q yia.”
18.1: Daa-witq timq mavg kan ninb Eei myenb cvj Paaiq kunq yetg Zin taub pcv Eei pcvb pyeiq Zauj kunq yetg pc'q taub pcv Eei pcvb pyeiq.
18.26: syruq kcv myenb cvj pwatg yetg taub myenb Tiuj Jyenq taaib. syruq kcv myenb zyrug heug zuaq kcvb myenb Buaj ninb, “mavg maa'b! cvj kanb maaib taub myenb Tiuj Jyenq taaib.” huvb tiaj kxvq, “taaij ninb yaag txb fyenj taaib.”
18.25: syruq kcv myenb zyrug heug Jyenq Buaj huvb tiaj. huvb tiaj kxvq, “sij kxvq Du'g taub myenb taaib Navq, taaij ninb txb fyenj taaib Buaj.” uaq taub myenb kunq zruj kunq taaib fatq.

8.18: ye-ho-yaa-Daa Eei txn, Be-nai-yaa, kunq Ke-le-Ti myenb Zauj Pe-letq myenb. Daa-witq Eei txn Bua tu'q zruj peiq zeiq.
8.3: Daa-witq cvj mivb Bx'q soj-Baa Eei huvb, le-hopg Eei txn, haa-Datg-e-se, txij haa-Datg-e-se Zwrtq mivb weig cvj xij lyepg wrnq ninb Eei kua'q yem yu-fe-titg Daaib Len Eei txvj.
8.8: Daa-witq cvj mivb haa-Datg-e-se Eei i nxm zivb, Be-Taa Zauj Be-lo-Tai, Zaavq tu'q tovb si'q Zamq haig.
8.9: haa-matq huvb, To-i, haid kxvq Daa-witq Bx'q hivb soj-Baa Eei huvb, haa-Datg-e-se Eei yetg zuvq Junb pcv,
8.7: Daa-witq yaag Zaavq haa-Datg-e-se Eei Jyen nanq Jyenq Eei Jyemb Txvb paaib txb mivb ye-lu-saa-lem.
8.5: Daa-matq-katg Eei si-lia myenb Zwrtq taaib Tevj soj-Baa Eei huvb, haa-Datg-e-se, uaq zang, Daa-witq taij ninb Bua Eei pcv i waang i Zin taub.
8.16: sej-lu-yaa Eei txn, yo-aapg, zruj kaub Lo Jiaj Eei tomb pcvb pyeiq. aa-hi-lutq Eei txn, ye-ho-saa-fatq, zruj fiaq srub taan Eei Jyen.
8.17: aa-hi-Tupq Eei txn, saaj-Dokg, Zauj aa-Bi-yaa-Taa Eei txn, aa-hi-me-lekq, zruj sai myenb. sej-lai-aa zruj srub piuq.
8.14: ninb lyepg pcvb Zyavq yem e-Dom. ninb lyepg pcvb Zyavq yem kxmj e-Dom teig. e-Dom myenb zyrug zu'g yem Daa-witq Eei puab Diaq. maiq kunq ninb mivb haaij, zyruq pun Daa-witq hivb Jiaj.
8.4: Daa-witq Zaavq tu'q ninb Eei keb maad pcv yetg Zin Zyetq pc'q taub Zauj yavb Dau Eei pcv i waang taub. ninb Va'q Tx Bx'q Jaaj maab Zia Eei maad Eei tomb lwavg Jaan tavj, Kuvj lyrub Bx'q Jaaj Zia Eei yetg pc'q taub maad Navq.
8.2: Daa-witq yaag Bx'q hivb mo-apg myenb. ninb aapq ninb Bua pweij ka'Diaq Dau Baib Jyenq zyrug lovg Laav Dx'g. pua kruq Eei i kruq taij kwavg, lyrub yetg kruq tu'q mcvg Zwrtq. mo-apg myenb zyrug yem ninb Eei puab Diaq yaag xij zu'g Zwrtq Rru pun ninb.
8.6: Ga'haaq Daa-witq yem Daa-matq-katg zivb Eei aa-lam teig lyepg pcvb Zyavq. aa-lam myenb zyrug zu'g yem Daa-witq Eei puab Diaq yaag Zwrtq Rrub zinb pun ninb. maiq kunq Daa-witq mivb haaij, zyruq pun ninb hivb Jiaj.
8.13: Daa-witq yem Raub hxvd taij e-Dom myenb yetg waang Yetg Zin taub. Rwrnj taaib ninb tu'q mevb taub Lo haig.
8.12: se ninb zx'q yem e-Dom, mo-apg, am-mon myenb, fi-li-saa-tia myenb Zauj aa-maa-lekq myenb Zauj soj-Baa huvb, le-hopg Eei txn, haa-Datg-e-se Zaavq taaib Eei ka'naaiq fuvj pun zyruq.
8.15: Navq naaig Daa-witq kunq kxmj Revg i-saa-laa-en teib puv yaag weig ninb Eei zwavj pc'g fivj zruj hxpg, zruj pcvb fim.
8.11: Daa-witq huvb yaag zx'q naaiq teij Jaab sig Zauj Jyenq ninb Bx'q hivb fivb fivj myenb Zaavq taaib Eei Jyem Eaanb,
8.1: hod taaib Daa-witq mivb Bx'q hivb fi-li-saa-tia myenb, zx'q ninb Bua yem ninb Eei puab Diaq. ninb yaag Zaavq tu'q fi-li-saa-tia myenb Eei me-Tekq-am-maa muvq.
8.10: To-i zyrug Paaiq ninb Eei txn, yo-lam, mivb wig pwavb Daa-witq huvb, kxvq waag Tevj ninb a'Neiq weig ninb tu'q Bx'q hivb haa-Datg-e-se, weig zu'g haa-Datg-e-se zanb zang mivb Zauj To-i Bx'q Jaaj. yo-lam yaag txb Jyenq lovg Jyem Eaanb Zauj tovb si'q zruj taaib Eei Euvb Euvg Jaab sig taaib fuvj Daa-witq.

3.18: ib zang kunq Navq naaig zruj a'q. weig zu'g zyruq lcvd Jiaj waag Buaj Daa-witq, ‘yia xij lovg yia Eei pru, Daa-witq, Eei puad Fruj yia Eei pc'g fivj i-saa-laa-en myenb pyauj Dutq fi-li-saa-tia myenb Eei puab Diaq yaag Fruj ninb Bua pyauj Dutq ninb Bua Eei yetg zuvq winb wavq Eei puab Diaq.’+”
3.8: laaij itg-Bo-setq kxvq naaiq teij waag apg-ne Qiaj Jiad haig. ninb zyrug kxvq, “yia zruj yu-Daa Eei Jub mGxvq fai? yem kxn Tauj ib zang yia zruj lovj pun meib Eei tia, sau-lo, Eei trub zov Zauj ninb Eei kxb yrud Zauj lob kcv txig. yia maiq zx'q meib Bua Jiu pun yem Daa-witq Eei puab Diaq.
3.33: huvb tiaj weig apg-ne paauj naaiq tiub naang zivb Ruv, “apg-ne hxpg zu'g taig Navq myenb Vovj myenb taig fai?
3.3: ta'Eeig taub txn Eei Buaj heug Ki-le-aapg, se Kaan-men myenb, naa-Baan Eei aub kwaaq, aa-Bi-kaa-yin, yuvd taaib. ta'faam taub Eei Buaj heug apg-saa-lom, se ke-su Eei huvb, Tan-mai, Eei sia'q, maa-aa-Kaa, yuvd taaib.
3.32: ninb Bua zyrug zavj apg-ne yem he-Bo-lon. ninb Bua yetg zuvq pc'g fivj yaag Eyemq. huvb tiaj yem apg-ne Eei zruq puvb siv puvb Qiaj Eei Eyemq apg-ne. zwavj pc'g fivj Zauj Jyenq Eyemq.
3.21: apg-ne kxvq Buaj Daa-witq, “yia xij Rwrnj mivb heug i-saa-laa-en Eei zwavj myenb kapq zunq taaib Zauj meib, yia Eei zyruq, huvb tiaj, lyepg vcvg waag weig pun meib zruj huvb sweib eij kunq Tauj haaij.” Daa-witq zyrug fuvj apg-ne Zwrtq Jauq. ninb Bua zyrug pcvb xn Eei mivb a'q.
3.35: Ba'Nxi maiq kcvb Dxtq Eei zyavb hog, zwavj myenb Kwinj Daa-witq Eang Naavj mq paag Daa-witq hruq Jyenq waag kxvq, “sij kxvq Ba'Nxi maiq kcvb mwrtq Eei zyavb hog yia Eang Naavj fai kanb Euvg ka'naaiq, Toq Tinb huvb Niab Niaq Eei tivg yia Eei zwid.”
3.14: Daa-witq Paaiq trug fyenj myenb mivb Buaj sau-lo Eei txn, itg-Bo-setq, “Toq fuvj yia Eei auq, mi-Kaan, taaib pun yia. yia lovg yetg pc'q nxm fi-li-saa-tia myenb Eei Jaib zweiq Dopq tivg zyavj ninb mig a'q.”
3.23: yo-aapg Zauj kan ninb taaib Eei Junb pcv taaib Tauj, maaib myenb Buaj yo-aapg, “ne Eei txn, apg-ne, taaib lxd huvb tiaj. huvb tiaj yaag fuvj ninb Rwrnj. ninb yaag pcvb xn Eei mivb mig a'q.”
3.6: sau-lo Eei trub zov Zauj Daa-witq Eei trub zov Bx'q Jaaj Eei zyavb hog, apg-ne yem sau-lo Eei trub zov ka'Euad Tevj ninb kanb kunq zruj kunq henq.
3.34: meib Eei puad maiq zu'g Dob, meib Eei zauj yaag maiq zu'g limg Kauj, meib taig Navq yem x'q myenb Eei Ra'Myen taig nx.” zwavj pc'g fivj weig apg-ne cvj Eyemq.
3.2: Daa-witq yem he-Bo-lon tu'q ziaj taub txn. ninb Eei taaub taub txn Eei Buaj heug am-non, se yitq-le-en myenb, aa-hi-no-am, yuvd taaib.
3.36: zwavj pc'g fivj pwatg huvb tiaj Navq naaiq nx zruj ninb Bua pwavq Hruq. ninb Bua pwavq Hruq huvb tiaj Eei Euvb Euvg sig.
3.20: apg-ne maaib Eig zyepg taub myenb Zauj ninb mivb he-Bo-lon pwavb Daa-witq. Tauj uaq Daa-witq zyrug weig apg-ne Zauj kan ninb uaq teij myenb Beng tonj Naavj Lo Eei.
3.24: yo-aapg zyrug mivb lxd huvb tiaj. ninb kxvq, “meib fuvg Navq naaig nx zruj? ne Eei txn, apg-ne, taaib lxd huvb tiaj. meib zruj haiq Euvg fuvj ninb Rwrnj? ninb zyrug tu'q pyauj Dutq mig a'q.
3.28: Ga'haaq Daa-witq haid kxvq Tauj naaiq teij sig ninb kxvq, “yia Zauj yia Eei kua'q txv Jyenq zyruq weig ne Eei txn, apg-ne, zu'g taij taig lyrug Ryaamq Zwrtq Eei zwid yetg liud maiq zu'g Daamb txv.
3.7: sau-lo maaib taub Jaab zeib auq se ai-aa Eei sia'q, Buaj heug litq-paa. itg-Bo-setq kxvq Buaj apg-ne, “meib weig haiq tiug pweij yia Eei tia Eei Jaab zeib auq?”
3.29: Toq pun naaiq teij taij myenb Eei zwid Dxtq zu'g yo-aapg Zauj ninb Eei tia Eei trub zov. Toq pun ninb Bua Eei zeib fun yetg liud maaib sig, maiq hxpg zu'g lyrug Zwrtq Eei ka'naaiq Eei pcvg myenb, Zauj putq komb huq pcvg Eei myenb, Zauj Byaag Jyenq pyaaq Eei myenb, Zauj zu'g Ru'g Daauq taij Eei myenb, Zauj maiq maaib Naavj Eang Eei myenb.”
3.19: apg-ne yaag Zauj Ben-yaa-min myenb kxvq. Ga'haaq cvj mivb Tauj he-Bo-lon zx'q i-saa-laa-en myenb Zauj Ben-yaa-min myenb Eei yetg zuvq zeib fun pwatg hxpg zu'g zruj Eei sig pun Daa-witq mwavj.
3.17: apg-ne zyrug Zauj i-saa-laa-en myenb Eei myenb koj Zaavb laavb kxvq, “Jiaj taaib laub a'q, meib Bua kxvq xij pun Daa-witq zruj meib Bua Eei huvb.
3.38: huvb tiaj kxvq Buaj ninb Eei Jyen, “meib Bua maiq hiuq fai? ib Nxi yem i-saa-laa-en Bu'Dovj maaib taub zruj Lo Eei tomb pyeiq zeiq zu'g taig mig a'q.
3.31: Daa-witq zyrug Buaj yo-aapg Zauj kan ninb uaq teij zwavj pc'g fivj, “petq meib Bua Eei lwib hruj cvj zu'q Jyenq la'maab Diab Zru, yem apg-ne Eei penq uaq Daavg mcvj Raub Eyemq.” Daa-witq huvb yaag kan Jyenq penq Ga'haaq Gaav mivb.
3.30: yo-aapg Zauj ninb Eei yrud, aa-Bi-Qai, taij apg-ne, weig yem ki-Be-on Bx'q Jaaj uaq zang apg-ne taij ninb Bua Eei yrud, aa-saaj-hen.
3.27: apg-ne Rwrnj Tauj he-Bo-lon uaq zang, yo-aapg txb ninb pia'g zivb kcvb Bu'Dovj Eei txvj pivj Jyenq kxvq teij waag. yem uaq yo-aapg zyrug Ropq apg-ne Eei ka'sia. apg-ne zyrug taig mig a'q. Navq naaig se weig yo-aapg Jaauq ninb Eei yrud, aa-saaj-hen, zu'g taij Eei win.
3.11: itg-Bo-setq maiq kaamq tau yetg Jruj apg-ne, weig zu'g ninb kamb Riaj apg-ne.
3.5: ta'lua'g taub Eei Buaj heug itg-le-am, se Daa-witq Eei auq, ekg-laa, yuvd taaib. naaiq teij txn se Daa-witq yem he-Bo-lon tu'q taaib.
3.9: mq paag ib zang meib laaij naaiq taub msia'q txn lxd sig koj yia. sij kxvq yia maiq Tevj Daa-witq zruj Zwrtq zyruq hruq Jyenq lcvd pun Eei waag, Toq Tinb huvb maiq kwavg yia, apg-ne, Eei zwid, zuvq Niab Niaq Eei tivg.
3.16: mq paag ninb Eei Goj kan Jyenq mivb, yetg ping mivb yetg ping Eyemq Tauj Baa-hu-lim teig. apg-ne Buaj ninb, “meib Rwrnj a'q.” ninb zyrug Rwrnj mig a'q.
3.37: uaq Nxi i-saa-laa-en Eei zwavj myenb hiuq tu'q ne Eei txn, apg-ne, zu'g taij taig se maiq zeid ei huvb tiaj Eei za'eij.
3.39: maiq kunq yia se xn taaib zruj huvb, ib Nxi yia haid mau mig a'q. sej-lu-yaa naaiq teij i taub txn kaub henq Jiaj yia, Toq zyruq ziuj ninb Bua zruj Eei x'q sig winb pun ninb Bua.”
3.4: ta'feij taub Eei Buaj heug aa-Do-ni-yaa, se hakq-kitg yuvd taaib. ta'Mmd taub Eei Buaj heug se-faa-Ti-yaa, se aa-Bi-Tan yuvd taaib.
3.10: yia xij Twij sau-lo Eei trub zov Eei kua'q Jiu pun Daa-witq yaag lyepg Daa-witq Eei weig kunq i-saa-laa-en Zauj yu-Daa, yem Daan mivb Tauj Be-e-Qe-Baa.”
3.22: uaq zang Daa-witq Eei myenb Zauj yo-aapg mivb luq myenb Rwrnj taaib yaag txb Jyenq luq taaib Eei ka'naaiq Zamq Eei. mq paag uaq zang apg-ne maiq yem he-Bo-lon, Daa-witq uaq a'q. Daa-witq fuvj ninb Zwrtq Jauq Rwrnj, ninb zyrug pcvb xn Eei mivb mig a'q.
3.12: apg-ne zyrug Paaiq myenb mivb he-Bo-lon tiq ninb pwavb Daa-witq naaig kaaj, “naaiq haiq taub Eei kua'q? sij kxvq meib Zauj yia lyepg vcvg waag, yia zyrug Tevj meib txb i-saa-laa-en Eei zwavj myenb taaib pun meib kunq.”
3.15: itg-Bo-setq zyrug Paaiq myenb mivb txb mi-Kaan yem ninb Eei Goj, laa-itg Eei txn, pan-Ti-en uaq taub taaib.
3.13: Daa-witq kxvq, “lovj Eei. yia Zauj meib lyepg vcvg waag. mq paag maaib tiug yia Toq meib. meib taaib Eei zyavb hog yia xij meib txb Jyenq sau-lo Eei sia'q, mi-Kaan. meib maiq txb nx, meib maiq tu'q pwatg yia Eei Myen.”
3.1: sau-lo Eei trub zov Eei Junb pcv Zauj Daa-witq Eei trub zov Eei Junb pcv Bx'q Jaaj laub haig a'q. Daa-witq kunq zruj kunq henq Jyenq faauj mq paag sau-lo Eei zeib fun kunq zruj kunq hei Jyenq Fiag.
3.26: yo-aapg yem Daa-witq uaq Zwrtq taaib, ninb Paaiq myenb mivb zung zaaig apg-ne. ninb Bua zyrug yem sij-laa-aa uamb Kwrtq txb ninb Rwrnj taaib mq paag Daa-witq maiq hiuq naaiq teij sig.
3.25: meib hiuq tu'q ne Eei txn, apg-ne, taaib Duaq meib, xij hiuq tu'q meib pia'g Zwrtq Eei Jauq Zauj meib zruj Eei yetg zuvq sig.”

21.18: hod taaib i-saa-laa-en myenb cvj Zauj fi-li-saa-tia myenb Bx'q Jaaj yem kopg. uaq Rung hu-saa myenb, sipg-Be-Kai, taij taub naaiq teij Lo Lav myenb Eei zeib fun, Buaj heug sapg-pe.
21.8: ninb zx'q ai-aa Eei sia'q, litq-paa, yuvd pun sau-lo Eei i taub txn, aan-mo-ni Zauj me-fi-Bo-setq. ninb cvj zx'q sau-lo Eei sia'q, me-laapq, yuvd pun me-hoj-laa myenb, Baa-sin-lai Eei txn, aatg-li-en, Eei pyaa taub txn.
21.3: Daa-witq naaig ki-Be-on myenb, “yia xij zu'g weig meib Bua zruj haiq Euvg? yia xij zu'g Navq haiq nx zruj Zivj fi'q tu'q Revg zwid weig pun meib Bua pwav waag pun zyruq Ripg Eei pwrng?”
21.21: ninb Druq i-saa-laa-en myenb Zauj ninb Bx'q Jaaj. Daa-witq Eei kxj, si-me-haa Eei txn, yo-naa-Taan, zyrug taij ninb a'q.
21.14: ninb Bua zavj sau-lo Zauj ninb Eei txn, yo-naa-Taan, Eei Buvq yem sau-lo Eei tia, Kitq, Eei zruq, Ben-yaa-min teig, ze-e-laa uaq. zwavj myenb zyrug ziuj huvb tiaj Paaiq Eei waag zruj zyavj Revg. Ga'haaq Tinb huvb mwavj weig uaq nxm teib puv Jrub Eei waag.
21.6: Toq zx'q siag taub ninb Eei zeib fun, tovb mJavg txn uaq teij, pun yia Bua yem zyruq Eei Ra'Myen, tovb zyruq kinq taaib uaq taub sau-lo Eei pwrnb teig muvq, ki-Be-aa, Diuj ninb Bua taig.” huvb tiaj kxvq, “yia zuvq zx'q ninb Bua taaib Jiu pun meib Bua.”
21.2: huvb tiaj zyrug heug ki-Be-on myenb taaib. (ki-Be-on myenb se maiq zeid i-saa-laa-en myenb. ninb Bua se zevg Fiag Eei aa-mo-lai myenb. i-saa-laa-en myenb Zauj ninb Bua lcvd vcvg waag lyrub ninb Bua Eei mcvg, mq paag sau-lo lxd Jauq taij ninb Bua weig zu'g ninb Jxm Hruq xij Tevj i-saa-laa-en Zauj yu-Daa myenb.)
21.20: Ga'haaq yem katg cvj maaib Rung Bx'q Jaaj. yem uaq nxm txvj maaib taub myenb zyavb tu'q Lo Lav Eei. ninb Eei puad yetg Jia'q maaib Ju'q nxm puab Do'q. ninb Eei zauj yetg Jia'q yaag maaib Ju'q nxm zaub Do'q. yetg zuvq maaib Eig zyepg feij nxm. ninb yaag zruj Lo Lav uaq teij myenb Eei zeib fun.
21.7: mq paag Daa-witq lyrub sau-lo Eei fun, yo-naa-Taan Eei txn, me-fi-Bo-setq, weig zu'g Daa-witq Zauj sau-lo Eei txn, yo-naa-Taan, lcvd Jiaj vcvg waag.
21.19: yem kopg cvj maaib Zauj fi-li-saa-tia myenb Bx'q Rung Jaaj. Betg-le-hem myenb, yaa-aa-le-o-le-kim, Eei txn, en-haa-nan, taij katg myenb, ko-li-atg, naaiq taub myenb Eei Zavb pcvj lomb Reng swij Datq Dia Eei pyaaq Lo.
21.17: mq paag sej-lu-yaa Eei txn, aa-Bi-Qai, taaib Tevj Daa-witq. ninb Bx'q uaq taub fi-li-saa-tia myenb cvj taij ninb a'q. Ga'haaq kan Daa-witq Eei myenb hruq Jyenq kxvq, “yavb naaiq mivb yia Bua maiq pun meib Zwrtq mivb Zauj yia Bua Bx'q Jaaj. Riaj i-saa-laa-en myenb Eei huvb trub haib zutg.”
21.11: maaib myenb Buaj Daa-witq, sau-lo Eei Jaab zeib auq, ai-aa Eei sia'q, litq-paa, Navq haiq nx zruj.
21.5: ninb Bua kxvq Buaj huvb tiaj, “zinb Daavg sau-lo taaq za'eij hxig yia Bua, xij myetg Revg yia Bua, maiq lyrub yia Bua tu'q yem i-saa-laa-en teib puv Eei haiq nxm txvj.
21.9: Daa-witq Jiu pun ki-Be-on myenb. ki-Be-on myenb zyrug yem nxm Bov kub vwaaig, yem zyruq Eei Ra'Myen Diuj ninb Bua siag taub taig. naaiq teij siag taub zyrug yetg Fiag taig. ninb Bua zu'g taij taig Eei zyavb hog se txij zu'g kaatq Byaub Eei Nxib Eia'g, se Jiad kxn kaatq Byaub Baa-li Eei zyavb hog.
21.16: maaib taub zyavb tu'q Lo Lav Eei myenb Eei zeib fun, Buaj heug itg-Bi-Be-nopq. ninb maaib tovb si'q Zav, Niab taaub i Jxib Zyetq luvd. ninb cvj sai Jyenq syavb Ru'g Daauq. ninb Namq xij taij Daa-witq.
21.4: ki-Be-on myenb tau huvb tiaj, “yia Bua Zauj sau-lo Zauj ninb Eei trub zov Eei sig maiq haib lovg Jyem Eaanb Beng suv. yia Bua yaag maiq maaib leid taij haiq taub i-saa-laa-en myenb taig.” Daa-witq kxvq, “meib Bua xij yia weig meib Bua zruj haiq Euvg?”
21.10: ai-aa Eei sia'q, litq-paa, lovg la'maab Diab Zru Zxv la'pyeib zxv kub vwaaig. yem Jiad kxn kaatq Byaub Eei zyavb hog Tauj luvb twib Byuvg, luvb Nxi zang ninb maiq pun Daamb luvb Eei nx'g taaib Ropg ninb Bua Eei sei, luvb mwrnd zang yaag maiq pun lomb Waav Eei Yiab zxib taaib nitq fatq.
21.22: naaiq teij pyei taub se yem katg zivb Lo Lav myenb Eei zeib fun. ninb Bua zu'g Daa-witq Zauj ninb Eei Jyen Eei puad taij Revg.
21.12: Daa-witq zyrug mivb yaa-Betg-ki-le-aatg zx'q sau-lo Zauj ninb Eei txn, yo-naa-Taan Eei Buvq Rwrnj taaib. (zinb Daavg fi-li-saa-tia myenb yem kin-Bo-aa taij sau-lo Bua, cvj txb ninb Bua Eei sei mivb Diuj Jyenq yem Betg-saan Eei tomb zwavj zaamg. yaa-Betg-ki-le-aatg Eei myenb mivb nimg ninb Bua taaib.)
21.15: fi-li-saa-tia myenb cvj taaib Zauj i-saa-laa-en myenb Bx'q Jaaj. Daa-witq Zauj ninb Eei Junb pcv Fiag mivb Bx'q fi-li-saa-tia myenb. Bx'q kau Jaaj, Daa-witq haid Kruq haig.
21.13: Daa-witq txb sau-lo Zauj ninb Eei txn, yo-naa-Taan, Eei Buvq Rwrnj taaib cvj syru zunq zu'g Diuj taig uaq teij siag taub Eei Buvq.
21.1: Daa-witq zruj huvb kunq Eei zyavb hog pwavb zu'g linb Jyenq pua Havj Eei tomb vxg. Daa-witq zyrug mivb yem zyruq Eei Ra'Myen naaig zyruq.  zyruq kxvq, “se laaij sau-lo taij ki-Be-on myenb Zivj maaib taij myenb taig Eei Ryaamq kua'q Jyenq sau-lo Zauj ninb Eei trub zov.”

14.18: huvb tiaj kxvq Buaj uaq taub msia'q txn, “yia xij naaig Jruj waag meib. tovb yia xij naaig Eei meib maiq tuvq pivj.” uaq taub msia'q txn kxvq, “Toq yia Eei zyruq, huvb tiaj, kunq kxvq a'q.”
14.8: huvb tiaj kxvq Buaj uaq taub msia'q txn, “kunq Rwrnj meib Eei pyauq maa'b! yia zyrug Paaiq waag liug leid meib Eei sig.”
14.33: yo-aapg zyrug mivb Buaj huvb tiaj. huvb tiaj heug apg-saa-lom taaib. ninb zyrug taaib Tauj huvb tiaj Eei Ra'Myen Pua'q Fiag Dau. huvb tiaj yaag zom apg-saa-lom.
14.3: xij zu'g pia'g mivb lxd huvb tiaj Navq naaiq nx kxvq Buaj ninb.” yo-aapg zyrug Faauj zyavj naaiq taub msia'q txn xij zu'g Navq haiq nx kxvq.
14.32: apg-saa-lom tau yo-aapg, “yia Paaiq myenb mivb lxd meib taaib, xij meib mivb lxd huvb tiaj Tevj yia kxvq, ‘yia weig haiq tiug yem ke-su Rwrnj? yia Zxg yem naaig kaub lovj. ib zang Toq pun yia mivb yem huvb tiaj Eei Ra'Myen. sij kxvq pwatg yia maaib txvg Eei txvj, kunq pun huvb tiaj taij yia taig.’+”
14.21: huvb tiaj kxvq Buaj yo-aapg, “uaq Euvg, yia Gxi Rwib pun meib zruj a'q. kunq mivb txb uaq taub myenb lunj myenb, apg-saa-lom, Rwrnj taaib.”
14.14: yia Bua taub taub zuvq zu'g taig, Navq uam Kuv Fiag Dau, maiq haib syru maiq Rwrnj a'q. Tinb huvb maiq zx'q myenb Eei mcvg. taauj Rwrnj ninb taaq za'eij pun zu'g leib Gxi ninb Eei myenb Rwrnj taaib.
14.23: yo-aapg zyrug Jiad sin taaib mivb ke-su, txb apg-saa-lom Rwrnj ye-lu-saa-lem.
14.6: yia, meib Eei msia'q pru, maaib i taub txn. maaib Nxi ninb Bua yem Deig Rcv Jaaj yaag maiq maaib myenb paaq ninb Bua. yetg taub zyrug taij uaq taub taig.
14.2: yo-aapg zyrug Paaiq myenb mivb Te-Ko-aa lxd taub Zovb mevb Eei msia'q txn, kxvq Buaj ninb, “Toq meib zruj eij leid Navq Raub Eyemq Eei myenb. zu'q Jyenq myenb Raub Eyemq Eei zyavb hog zu'q Eei lwib hruj yaag maiq tuvq Raatq yrub. xij zu'g zruj eij leid Navq weig taig mivb Eei myenb Raub Eyemq laub Eei msia'q txn.
14.20: meib Eei pru, yo-aapg, xij Navq naaiq zruj weig Byenq naaiq teij sig. mq paag yia Eei zyruq maaib Zovb mevb Navq Tinb huvb Eei finb myenb, haib hiuq tu'q luvb Diaq Eei yetg zuvq sig.”
14.24: huvb tiaj kxvq, “pun ninb mivb yem ninb kanb Eei ting, maiq tuvq pun ninb taaib yem yia Eei Ra'Myen.” apg-saa-lom zyrug yem ninb kanb Eei pyauq, maiq tu'q cvj taaib yem huvb tiaj Eei Ra'Myen.
14.28: apg-saa-lom yem ye-lu-saa-lem pwavq i Havj yaag maiq tu'q mivb yem huvb tiaj Eei Ra'Myen.
14.7: ib zang yia Eei zwavj Zyenb Ze'q taaib lxd yia, meib Eei msia'q pru, yaag kxvq, ‘zx'q tovb taij ninb Eei kxj uaq taub Jiu pun yia Bua taij weig Jaauq kxj zu'g taij taig Eei myenb mcvg win. ninb Bua lyemb xij zx'q tu'q Ripg Jaab tivb uaq taub taij.’ Navq naaig ninb Bua xij zx'q yia zevg Fiag Eei txn myetg. yia Eei Goj zyrug maiq maaib Buaj yaag maiq maaib hod txig yem naaiq luvb Diaq.”
14.29: apg-saa-lom Paaiq myenb mivb heug yo-aapg taaib, xij pun ninb mivb lxd huvb tiaj. mq paag yo-aapg vcvg Jyenq maiq taaib. apg-saa-lom cvj pun myenb mivb heug yo-aapg ta'Eeig Rung mq paag ninb Zxg maiq taaib.
14.19: Daa-witq naaig, “meib zruj Eei naaiq teij yetg zuvq sig se yo-aapg maaib pwrng Zauj Jyenq zruj fai?” uaq taub msia'q txn kxvq, “yia zyavq Jyenq yia Eei zyruq, huvb tiaj, Eei mcvg lcvd waag, yia Eei zyruq, huvb tiaj, kxvq Eei waag maiq Pyen mivb zaaij, mivb Byaaug. se huvb tiaj Eei pru, yo-aapg, heug yia zruj. se ninb Faauj yia, meib Eei msia'q pru, kxvq naaiq teij yetg zuvq waag.
14.17: “yia, meib Eei msia'q pru, cvj Namq taaib, ‘Toq yia Eei zyruq, huvb tiaj, Eei waag pun yia pcvb xn, weig zu'g yia Eei zyruq, huvb tiaj, se Navq Tinb huvb Eei finb myenb, hiuq tu'q lovj, hiuq tu'q Zyruq. Toq zyruq, meib Eei Tinb huvb, Zauj meib yem.’+”
14.31: yo-aapg zyrug mivb apg-saa-lom Eei pyauq naaig ninb, “meib Eei pru fuvg mivb puaq yia Eei Deig?”
14.30: apg-saa-lom zyrug Buaj ninb Eei pru, “mavg maa'b! yo-aapg Eei Deig Zauj yia Eei Deig yem nitq Jyenq Eei. Deig ka'Euad maaib Byaub Baa-li. meib Bua mivb puvj trud puaq maa'b!” apg-saa-lom Eei pru zyrug mivb puaq a'q.
14.27: apg-saa-lom tu'q pua taub txn Zauj yetg taub sia'q, Buaj heug Taa-maa. ninb se yetg taub Rweig haig Eei sia'q.
14.11: uaq taub msia'q txn cvj kxvq, “Toq zyavq Jyenq zyruq, meib Eei Tinb huvb, lcvd maiq pun Jaauq myenb mcvg win uaq taub cvj taij myenb, yia Eei txn zyrug maiq zu'g taig a'q.” huvb tiaj kxvq, “yia zyavq Jyenq zyavb Jyenq Eei zyruq lcvd waag kxvq, meib Eei txn Eei yetg tiub Ba'pyei maiq zu'g Dxtq Fiag Dau.”
14.5: huvb tiaj naaig ninb, “meib maaib haiq Euvg sig?” uaq taub msia'q txn kxvq, “yia se aub kwaaq. Goj taig mig a'q.
14.9: Te-Ko-aa myenb msia'q txn kxvq, “yia Eei zyruq, huvb tiaj aa'b! yia Zauj yia Eei tia Eei trub zov xij zu'g weig naaiq teij sig Daamb txv mq paag huvb tiaj Zauj huvb weig maiq zu'g Daamb txv.”
14.16: yia Namq taaib huvb tiaj xij mwavj yia, Fruj yia, meib Eei pru, Zauj yia Eei txn, pyauj Dutq Jiad Hruq xij myetg yia Bua Zauj yia Bua yem Tinb huvb Ripg taaib Eei pwrng.’
14.4: naaiq taub Te-Ko-aa myenb Eei msia'q txn mivb lxd huvb tiaj uaq zang, ninb Pua'q Fiag Dau paaij yaag kxvq, “o huvb tiaj aa'b! Toq Tevj yia.”
14.10: huvb tiaj kxvq, “sij kxvq maaib haiq taub kxvq haiq Euvg pun meib, meib kunq txb ninb taaib yia naaiq, ninb zyrug maiq mivb cvj la'Eauq meib a'q.”
14.22: yo-aapg zyrug Pua'q Fiag Dau paaij yaag pwav waag pun huvb tiaj. yo-aapg kxvq, “ib Nxi meib Eei pru, hiuq tu'q ziuj yia Eei zyruq, huvb tiaj, mavg yia zruj tu'q hxpg huvb tiaj Eei Hruq, weig zu'g huvb tiaj Gxi Rwib zruj ei meib Eei pru Toq Eei waag.”
14.12: uaq taub msia'q txn kxvq, “Toq pun yia, meib Eei msia'q pru, cvj kxvq Jruj waag Buaj yia Eei zyruq, huvb tiaj.” huvb tiaj tau, “kunq kxvq maa'b!”
14.15: “yia taaib kxvq naaiq teij waag Buaj yia Eei zyruq, huvb tiaj, weig zu'g pc'g fivj hc'q yia kamb Riaj. yia, meib Eei msia'q pru, Namq taaib, ‘yia xij Toq huvb tiaj. Riaj huvb tiaj xij ei Jyenq yia Toq Eei waag zruj.
14.13: naaiq taub msia'q txn kxvq, “uaq Euvg huvb tiaj weig haiq tiug Navq naaiq nx taaq za'eij hxig Tinb huvb Eei pc'g fivj? huvb tiaj Navq naaiq nx kxvq, huvb tiaj zuvq tivg kanb zruj txvg weig zu'g huvb tiaj maiq pun kanb Eei txn, tovb pyauj mivb uaq taub, Rwrnj.
14.1: sej-lu-yaa Eei txn, yo-aapg, hiuq tu'q huvb tiaj Eei Hruq Javj haig apg-saa-lom.
14.26: ninb Eei Ba'pyei Niaq haig, xij zu'g yetg Havj Japq Rung. Japq taaib uaq zang ninb ziuj huvb tiaj Ryav ka'naaiq Eei Niab taaub Ryav tu'q yetg Jxib zyepg petq luvd.
14.25: yem kxmj i-saa-laa-en teib puv maiq maaib yetg taub myenb Dovg apg-saa-lom Rweig, tu'q myenb Zev. yem ninb Eei mGxvb pcvb Tauj zaub Do'g Eeid pyeiq maiq maaib txvj Gemb.

23.18: sej-lu-yaa Eei txn, yo-aapg Eei yrud, aa-Bi-Qai, zruj uaq teij “faab zyepg taub” Eei pyeiq zeiq. ninb lovg Zav taij Revg faamb pc'q taub myenb zyrug tu'q mevb taub Navq uaq teij “pua taub” Lo.
23.8: naaiq se Daa-witq henq haig Eei Junb zeiq myenb Eei Buaj. maaib Takq-mo-ni myenb, yo-Qepq-Batg-Qe-Betg. ninb zruj uaq teij “pua taub” Eei pyeiq zeiq. ninb Bx'q yetg Rung Jaaj, ninb lovg Zav Ropq taig petq pc'q taub myenb.
23.33: haa-laa myenb, saa-maa Eei txn, haa-laa myenb, Qaa-laa, Eei txn, aa-hi-yam,
23.3: i-saa-laa-en Eei Tinb huvb kxvq, se peu i-saa-laa-en uaq taub kxvq Buaj yia, ‘haiq taub lovg pcvb fim Eei Jauq kunq myenb, se ninb Taaib Tinb huvb Eei waag kunq,
23.32: saa-an-Bon myenb, e-li-yaa-Baa, kim-so myenb, haa-sem, Eei zeib fun, yaa-sen Eei txn Bua, yo-naa-Taan,
23.21: ninb cvj taij taub Lo Lav Eei i-yipq myenb. uaq taub i-yipq myenb nanq Jyenq Zav mq paag Be-nai-yaa lovg Dyavb Donj Fiag mivb lxd. ninb Zaavq i-yipq myenb Eei Zav taaib, lovg uaq tiub Zav taij ninb a'q.
23.35: Kaan-men myenb, hetq-lo, aa-laapq myenb, paa-lai,
23.14: uaq zang Daa-witq yem nxm weib wrnq Eei txvj, fi-li-saa-tia myenb lyepg Zyavq yem Betg-le-hem.
23.23: ninb tu'q mevb taub kaub Lo uaq teij “faab zyepg taub” mq paag maiq Dovg uaq teij “pua taub.” Daa-witq yaag Paaiq ninb zruj ninb Eei sinb Len myenb Eei pyeiq zeiq.
23.6: mq paag yetg zuvq maiq lamb lovg Eei myenb Navq Fimq nx, zu'g zxi kwavg, maiq haib lovg puad zx'q.
23.34: maa-aa-Kaa myenb, aa-hatg-Bai Eei txn, e-li-fe-letq, ki-lon myenb, aa-hi-To-fen Eei txn, e-li-am,
23.2: “zyruq Eei sivj livb lovg yia kxvq, ninb Eei waag yem yia Eei Rwib.
23.36: soj-Baa myenb, naa-Tan Eei txn, i-kaan, katg myenb, Baa-ni,
23.20: ye-ho-yaa-Daa Eei txn, Be-nai-yaa, se yetg taub yem Kapg-se-en taaib Bx'q Jaaj henq Eei Junb zeiq myenb. ninb zruj ziaj Euvg Lo Eei sig. ninb taij i taub mo-apg myenb Bx'q Jaaj henq haig Eei pcv. cvj maaib Rung txij twib sxv Eei zyavb hog ninb Fiag nxm Kwrtq taij taub syenb taig.
