23.28: aa-hoj-hai myenb, sanj-mon, ne-To-faa myenb, maa-haa-lai,
23.7: mq paag haiq taub myenb mua'q, xij zu'g txb Jyenq Lia'g Jaab sig Zauj Zavb pcvj, yaag lovg trud puaq Qwi Revg.”
23.29: ne-To-faa myenb, Baa-aa-naa Eei txn, he-letq, Ben-yaa-min fivj, ki-Be-aa myenb, li-Bai Eei txn, itg-Tai,
23.19: yem uaq teij “faab zyepg taub” ka'Euad ninb tu'q myenb Taaib kaub Zamq. ninb tu'q zruj ninb Bua Eei pyeiq zeiq maiq kunq ninb maiq zeid uaq teij “pua taub” Eei yetg taub. mq paag peiq maiq Tauj uaq teij “pua taub.”
23.17: ninb kxvq, “o zyruq aag, yia fuvg haib hopq naaiq teij uam? se Navq hopq naaiq teij myenb Eei Ryaamq weig zu'g ninb Bua maiq lovg mcvg Eei mivb Damq taaib.” weig naaiq Daa-witq maiq hopq. naaiq se uaq teij pua taub henq haig Eei Junb pcv zruj Eei sig.
23.38: itg-lai myenb, i-laa, itg-lai myenb, kaa-lepq,
23.31: aa-laa-Baa myenb, aa-Bi-yan-Bon, Baa-hu-lim myenb, atg-maa-wetq,
23.30: pi-laa-Ton myenb, Be-nai-yaa, kaa-atg hxvd Eei myenb, hitq-Dai,
23.27: aa-naa-Totq myenb, aa-Bi-ye-se, hu-saa myenb, me-Bun-nai,
23.11: uaq teij “pua taub” Eei ta'faam taub se haa-laa myenb, aa-ke Eei txn, sam-maa. fi-li-saa-tia myenb kapq zunq yem Rov Deig maaib topg si'q pwavq Revg. i-saa-laa-en myenb Eei pcv Tiuj pyauj fi-li-saa-tia myenb.
23.5: “yia Eei zeib fun Zauj Tinb huvb hxpg maiq zeid? weig zu'g ninb Zauj yia lyepg yetg liud Eei vcvg waag, yetg zuvq maaib yetg Eeig yaag wrnq Eei. yia Eei Fruj en Zauj yetg zuvq maaib lamb Namq Eei, ninb zuvq xij zruj zyavj maiq zeid?
23.9: naaiq teij “pua taub” Eei ta'Eeig taub se aa-hoj-hai myenb, Do-Do Eei txn, e-le-aa-saa. maaib Rung ninb Zauj Daa-witq Druq fi-li-saa-tia myenb, tovb fi-li-saa-tia myenb kapq zunq taaib Bx'q Jaaj uaq zang. i-saa-laa-en Eei pcv zyrug Twij Revg.
23.16: naaiq teij pua taub henq haig Eei Junb pcv zyrug nimg pia'g fi-li-saa-tia myenb Eei Zyavq, Damq teij yem Betg-le-hem zivb kcvb ka'Len Eei uamb Kwrtq Eei uam txb Rwrnj pun Daa-witq. mq paag ninb maiq Kavq hopq. taauj Rwrnj ninb toj Zwrtq yem zyruq Eei Ra'Myen.
23.37: am-mon myenb, sej-lekq, Be-e-lotq myenb, naa-haa-lai, se Tevj sej-lu-yaa Eei txn, yo-aapg, txb Bx'q Jaaj Eei ua'g king uaq taub.
23.39: hitq-Tai myenb, u-li-yaa, yetg zuvq maaib faab zyepg Zyetq taub.
23.4: ninb kunq myenb Navq luvb Dxm Ba'Nxi Zwrtq Eei Fav, Navq luvb Dxm Ryruq, maiq maaib Bwrnj, Navq twib paag Byuvg Eei Fav, Navq Byuvg pun miaq yem Dau Zwrtq.’
23.10: mq paag e-le-aa-saa sruq Jyenq uaq taij fi-li-saa-tia myenb Tauj ninb Eei puad Ewij, zuvq nctq Jyenq Ru'g Daauq Jruq. uaq Nxi zyruq pun i-saa-laa-en myenb hivb Jiaj Revg. Bx'q paag Jaaj, pcv Rwrnj e-le-aa-saa uaq, mq paag Kuvj weig Raud zu'g taij taig uaq teij myenb Eei ka'naaiq Navq.
23.22: naaiq se ye-ho-yaa-Daa Eei txn, Be-nai-yaa, zruj Eei sig. ninb yaag tu'q mevb taub Navq uaq teij pua taub henq haig Eei Junb zeiq myenb Lo.
23.12: mq paag sam-maa sruq Jyenq uaq Rov Deig ka'Euad Rcv uaq Rov Deig yaag taij fi-li-saa-tia myenb. zyruq Tevj i-saa-laa-en myenb za'kevb! hivb Jiaj.
23.15: Daa-witq haid vxg uam zyrug kxvq Zwrtq Rwib, “feij tu'q maaib myenb mivb Damq teij yem Betg-le-hem zivb kcvb ka'Len Eei uamb Kwrtq Eei uam taaib pun yia hopq.”
23.13: maaib “faab zyepg taub” uaq teij henq haig Eei Junb zeiq myenb Eei pua taub Fiag Tauj aa-Dun-lam Eei Bcvb Kwrtq lxd Daa-witq. cvj maaib kwanb fi-li-saa-tia myenb lyepg Zyavq yem le-faa-im hxvd.
23.1: naaiq se Daa-witq Eei setq mweid waag. “se Jyetg-si Eei txn, Daa-witq, tovb tu'q lyepg faauj Lav uaq taub kxvq. se yaa-Kopq Eei Tinb huvb lovg yrub xn ninb taaib, ninb weig i-saa-laa-en zog Kub mwavj Eei Ruv kxvq,
23.26: Pe-letq myenb, he-letq-Te, Te-Ko-aa myenb, ikg-Ketg Eei txn, i-laa,
23.25: haa-lotq myenb, sam-maa, haa-lotq myenb, e-li-Kaa,

6.18: fovg hxg ziag liud puaq ziag Eei ka'naaiq Zauj ziag weig Jiu Tov Eei ka'naaiq, Daa-witq tevq nrnb Jiaj Eei zyruq Eei Buaj pwav waag pun pc'g fivj.
6.8: Daa-witq Qiaj Jiad weig zu'g zyruq Eei ka'Qiaj pctq Zwrtq taij utg-saa. uaq nxm txvj zyrug maaib Buaj heug pe-letq-utg-saa Tauj ib Jaaj Nxi.
6.3: ninb Bua zx'q Tinb huvb Eei lcvd vcvg waag faav yem Bov kub vwaaig, aa-Bi-naa-Dapg Eei pyauq, Zwrtq taaib an nxm syavb vovb Zia. aa-Bi-naa-Dapg Eei i taub txn, utg-saa Zauj aa-hi-yo, yend syavb Zia Eei Jauq.
6.21: Daa-witq kxvq Buaj mi-Kaan, “yia yem zyruq Eei Ra'Myen. ninb kinq yia tiq meib Eei tia Zauj tia Eei yetg zuvq trub zov, lyepg yia zruj zyruq Eei pc'g fivj, i-saa-laa-en myenb, Eei huvb. yia yaag xij txv Jyenq zyruq zruj naug Eitg.
6.14: Daa-witq zu'q Jyenq lovg la'maab Dia zruj taaib Eei e-fotq. ninb txv Jyenq zyruq lovg Revg Qa'q Zavj heij.
6.23: sau-lo Eei sia'q, mi-Kaan, Tauj taig Eei zyavb hog ninb maiq yuvd fu'Jweiq.
6.6: ninb Bua taaib Tauj naa-Kon Eei Bx'q Byaub Zyavq, yavb vovb Di'q zu'g Kaaq teij Dxpg. utg-saa zyrug suv puad paaq Jyenq Tinb huvb Eei lcvd vcvg waag faav.
6.2: Daa-witq Zauj ninb Eei zwavj myenb zyrug yem yu-Daa Eei Baa-aa-laa Zwrtq mivb weig txb Tinb huvb Eei lcvd vcvg waag faav yem uaq taaib. naaiq nxm faav kan nrnb Jiaj Eei zyruq Eei Buaj heug, tovb yem uaq teij i taub Ke-lu-Bim Bu'Dovj Eei weig.
6.20: Daa-witq Rwrnj pyauq xij pwav waag pun ninb Eei pyauq zov myenb, sau-lo Eei sia'q, mi-Kaan, Zwrtq taaib zipq Daa-witq yaag kxvq, “i-saa-laa-en Eei huvb ib Nxi za'kevb pun ninb kanb tu'q mevb taub haig, txv Jyenq ninb Eei pru Eei nrub peid Jaiq lwib hruj Navq taub zaang haig Eei myenb Jaiq lwib hruj, maiq hiuq tu'q Eaiq.”
6.7: zyruq Qiaj Jiad haig utg-saa weig zu'g ninb suv puad paaq lcvd vcvg waag faav. Tinb huvb zyrug yem naaig taij ninb. ninb zyrug yem Tinb huvb Eei lcvd vcvg waag faav ka'Len taig mig a'q.
6.19: Ga'haaq Daa-witq cvj pun taub taub i-saa-laa-en myenb, maiq kunq mJavg msia'q, yetg taub pun yetg nxm Fuaq, yetg Dunb xb zi'q Zauj teij a'vung pyrub Gaai. kx'g myenb zyrug Rwrnj kx'g myenb Eei pyauq.
6.17: ninb Bua txb zyruq Eei lcvd vcvg waag faav pia'g taaib an Jyenq liug leid zyavj Eei txvj yem Daa-witq Zxv taaib weig faav uaq nxm Dopg liub. Daa-witq yaag yem zyruq Eei Ra'Myen fovg hxg puaq ziag Eei ka'naaiq Zauj ziag weig Jiu Tov Eei ka'naaiq.
6.11: zyruq Eei lcvd vcvg waag faav yem o-Betg-e-Dom Eei pyauq pua Laaj Eia'g. zyruq Zeij fu'q pun ninb yaag Zeij fu'q pun ninb Eei yetg pyauq myenb.
6.5: Daa-witq Zauj i-saa-laa-en Eei zwavj myenb yem zyruq Eei Ra'Myen lovg Revg Qa'q zruj naug Eitg. ninb Bua paauj Ruv, Patq tomb taanb paab, fiub taanb paab, Bx'q lxb Bx'q Rod, Gaapq Zaaub zeiq.
6.9: uaq Nxi Daa-witq kamb Riaj zyruq. ninb kxvq, “zyruq Eei lcvd vcvg waag faav yia fuvg haib kaamq txb mivb yia Eei txvj?”
6.16: zyruq Eei lcvd vcvg waag faav pia'g Daa-witq Eei zivb uaq zang, sau-lo Eei sia'q, mi-Kaan, mavg Zwrtq fov mwrnb pwatg Daa-witq huvb yem zyruq Eei Ra'Myen piu mivb piu taaib Eei Zavj heij. mi-Kaan zyrug yem Hruq mavg Piaj ninb a'q.
6.4: ninb Bua zx'q Tinb huvb Eei lcvd vcvg waag faav yem Bov kub vwaaig, aa-Bi-naa-Dapg Eei pyauq, Zwrtq taaib uaq zang, aa-hi-yo mivb Daavg, faav Ga'haaq.
6.10: Daa-witq zyrug maiq Kavq txb zyruq Eei lcvd vcvg waag faav mivb pia'g Daa-witq Eei zivb. ninb zyrug wivg kanb tiub Jauq txb mivb an katg myenb, o-Betg-e-Dom, Eei pyauq.
6.22: yia zuvq xij zatq kanb Fiag aiq Tauj yia kanb Eei mziv mavg pwatg yia se haag hxvb myenb. mq paag meib kxvq uaq teij nrub peid, ninb Bua zuvq xij Taaib yia.”
6.12: maaib myenb kxvq Buaj Daa-witq huvb, “weig Tinb huvb Eei lcvd vcvg waag faav zyruq Zeij fu'q pun o-Betg-e-Dom Eei yetg pyauq myenb Zauj ninb maaib Eei yetg zuvq ka'naaiq.” Daa-witq zyrug mivb Fyenb Fyen yrub yrub Eei txb Tinb huvb Eei lcvd vcvg waag faav yem o-Betg-e-Dom Eei pyauq taaib Tauj Daa-witq Eei zivb.
6.15: Daa-witq Zauj i-saa-laa-en Eei zwavj zeib fun heug Jyenq yaag maaib pyomq Jxv Eei Qiaj Bwi, txb Jyenq zyruq Eei lcvd vcvg waag faav taaib Tauj ye-lu-saa-lem.
6.13: kcv zyruq Eei lcvd vcvg waag faav uaq teij laamj Ju'q Biag, Daa-witq lovg taub vovb kruq Zauj taub vovb txnb Jung fovg hxg ziag.
6.1: Daa-witq cvj heug yem i-saa-laa-en kinq taaib Eei myenb kapq zunq. yetg zuvq maaib pua waang taub.

2.18: sej-lu-yaa Eei pua taub txn, yo-aapg, aa-Bi-Qai Zauj aa-saaj-hen yem naaig. aa-saaj-hen Eei zauj Tiuj tu'q syepq Navq Yiab Faib nx.
2.8: sau-lo Eei Junb pcv Eei tomb pcvb pyeiq, ne Eei txn, apg-ne, txb sau-lo Eei txn, itg-Bo-setq, pyauj Jiaj uaq vaang zi'g Jx-Dcn Daaib Tauj maa-haa-naa-im mig a'q.
2.3: Daa-witq yaag txb Jyenq kan ninb uaq teij myenb, Zauj ninb Bua kx'g myenb Eei Mwavq txig mivb. ninb Bua zyrug yem he-Bo-lon zivb Zauj weib kxmj Eei muvq.
2.32: yo-aapg cvj Zauj kan ninb Eei myenb zyrug txb aa-saaj-hen Eei sei mivb Tauj Betg-le-hem zavj Jyenq ninb Eei tia Eei zruq. Ga'haaq ninb Bua zyavb mwrnd yavb Jauq. luvb Byrub Byrud Fav Eei zyavb hog ninb Bua Tauj he-Bo-lon mig a'q.
2.21: apg-ne kxvq Buaj ninb, “kunq mivb zaaij fai mivb Byaaug maa'b! zx'q taub myenb lunj myenb cvj luq ninb Bx'q Jaaj Eei ka'naaiq.” mq paag aa-saaj-hen zung Jyenq ninb mivb, maiq tivb.
2.14: apg-ne kxvq Buaj yo-aapg, “pun myenb lunj myenb Jiad sin taaib txv Jyenq yia Bua saaij maa'b!” yo-aapg tau, “kunq pun ninb Bua saaij a'q.”
2.23: mq paag aa-saaj-hen maiq Kavq tivb, Zxg zung Jyenq mivb. apg-ne zyrug lovg Zavb pcvj Ropq aa-saaj-hen Eei ka'sia. Zav zuvq Ropq Tov Zwrtq Ga'haaq mcvj. aa-saaj-hen yem naaig Kiv Fiag Dau taig mig a'q. haiq taub taaib Tauj ninb Kiv Fiag taig Eei txvj zyrug tivb sruq Jyenq uaq.
2.6: ib zang Toq zyruq zyepg zua'q Eei Namq yaag pcvb fim Eei txb meib Bua. yia yaag xij zruj lovj pun meib Bua weig zu'g meib Bua Navq naaiq nx zruj.
2.2: Daa-witq zyrug txb Jyenq ninb Eei i taub auq, se yitq-le-en myenb, aa-hi-no-am, Zauj Kaan-men myenb, naa-Baan Eei aub kwaaq, aa-Bi-kaa-yin.
2.20: apg-ne Win Rwrnj mavg yaag naaig, “meib aa-saaj-hen fai?” aa-saaj-hen tau, “zeid Eei.”
2.24: mq paag yo-aapg Zauj aa-Bi-Qai zung Jyenq apg-ne mivb. Ba'Nxi Dxtq Eei zyavb hog ninb Bua Tauj am-maa Bovb aiq, yem ki-Be-on teib puvb Waav Eei uaq nxm ki-yaa Eei Ra'Myen mcvj.
2.28: yo-aapg zyrug pyomq Jxv. zwavj myenb zyrug tivb, maiq cvj zung i-saa-laa-en myenb a'q, yaag maiq cvj Bx'q Jaaj.
2.7: ib zang meib Bua xij zu'g henq, taamq Lo Eei, weig zu'g meib Bua Eei zyruq, sau-lo, taig mig a'q. yu-Daa fivj Eei myenb zuvq xn yia zruj ninb Bua Eei huvb kunq ninb Bua.”
2.29: apg-ne Zauj ninb Eei myenb zyavb mwrnd yavb Jauq Jiaj aa-laa-Baa, cvj Jiaj Jx-Dcn Daaib. ninb Bua cvj Jiaj Revg Bitq-lon hxvd mivb Tauj maa-haa-naa-im.
2.19: aa-saaj-hen zung Jyenq apg-ne mivb, yaag maiq mivb zaaij, maiq mivb Byaaug.
2.17: uaq Nxi Bx'q Eei Jaaj za'kevb Niaq haig. apg-ne Zauj i-saa-laa-en myenb zu'g swei Daa-witq Eei pcv.
2.31: mq paag Daa-witq Eei myenb taij faamb pc'q lua'g zyepg taub kan apg-ne Eei Ben-yaa-min myenb.
2.30: yo-aapg zung kau apg-ne, cvj taauj sin Rwrnj taaib. ninb pun ninb Eei myenb kapq zunq Eei zyavb hog, Zib Zwrtq aa-saaj-hen, Daa-witq Eei pcv Zaa zyepg Juaq taub.
2.27: yo-aapg kxvq, “yia zyavq Jyenq yetg liud zyavb Eei Tinb huvb kxvq, sij kxvq meib maiq kxvq uaq Jruj waag, naaiq teij myenb xij zung Jyenq Tauj Fav Dxm.”
2.11: Daa-witq yem he-Bo-lon zruj huvb kunq yu-Daa Eei zeib fun siag Havj Zauj Ju'q Laaj Eia'g.
2.5: Daa-witq zyrug Paaiq trug fyenj myenb mivb lxd yaa-Betg-ki-le-aatg myenb, kxvq Buaj ninb Bua, “Toq zyruq Zeij fu'q pun meib Bua weig zu'g meib Bua Navq naaiq nx zruj lovj pun meib Bua Eei zyruq, sau-lo, txb ninb zavj Jyenq.
2.9: yem naaig apg-ne lyepg itg-Bo-setq zruj huvb kunq ki-le-aatg teig Zauj aa-se myenb, yitq-le-en myenb, e-faa-im myenb, Ben-yaa-min myenb Zauj i-saa-laa-en Eei zwavj myenb.
2.16: yetg taub txij yetg taub Eau Jyenq mGxvq, lovg Ru'g Daauq, laanb Ropq laanb Eei la'Eaapq, yetg zuvq Kiv Fiag taig Revg mig a'q. weig naaiq yem ki-Be-on naaiq nxm txvj maaib Buaj heug hen-Katg-hatq-su-lim.
2.4: yu-Daa myenb zyrug taaib Tauj he-Bo-lon lovg yrub xn Daa-witq zruj yu-Daa Eei zeib fun Eei huvb. maaib myenb taaib kxvq Buaj Daa-witq, “se yaa-Betg-ki-le-aatg myenb zavj sau-lo.”
2.10: sau-lo Eei txn, itg-Bo-setq, faauj weig zruj huvb kunq i-saa-laa-en uaq zang ninb Eei Havb Jeiq tu'q feij zyepg Havj. ninb yaag kunq tu'q i Havj. mq paag yu-Daa Eei zeib fun kan Daa-witq.
2.22: apg-ne cvj Kwinj Rung aa-saaj-hen, “tivb Fiag, maiq tuvq zung yia maa'b! yia fuvg xij zu'g taij meib? yia taij meib, Navq haiq nx haib mavg meib Eei kxj, yo-aapg, Eei Myen?”
2.12: ne Eei txn, apg-ne, Zauj Jyenq sau-lo Eei txn, itg-Bo-setq, Eei pcv yem maa-haa-naa-im Zwrtq taaib mivb Tauj ki-Be-on zivb.
2.15: ziuj ninb Bua tivg zyavj Eei sruj mrug ninb Bua Jiad sin taaib. weig Ben-yaa-min Zauj sau-lo Eei txn, itg-Bo-setq, maaib zyepg Eeig taub. weig Daa-witq yaag maaib zyepg Eeig taub.
2.13: sej-lu-yaa Eei txn, yo-aapg,  Zauj Jyenq Daa-witq Eei pcv Zwrtq mivb Tauj ki-Be-on syru uam Eei Kwrtq ka'Len pwavb apg-ne Bua. ninb Bua zyrug zweid Jyenq, yetg kwanb zweid naaiq puv Faavb Len, yetg kwanb zweid uaq puv Faavb Len.
2.1: naaiq teij sig Jiaj liud, Ga'haaq Daa-witq naaig zyruq, “yia hxpg zu'g mivb yu-Daa Eei yetg nxm zivb fai?”   zyruq kxvq, “kunq mivb a'q.” Daa-witq cvj naaig, “xij zu'g mivb haiq nxm zivb?”   zyruq tau, “he-Bo-lon zivb.”
2.26: apg-ne heug Jyenq yo-aapg, “Ru'g Daauq xij zu'g yetg liud taij myenb fai? meib Bua maiq hiuq tu'q Tauj setq mweid Kuvj haib Zwrtq Kruq Eei Jauq? meib zuaq Tauj haiq zang Zivj hatg meib Eei myenb tivb Fiag, maiq zung ninb Bua Eei kxb yrud?”
2.25: Ben-yaa-min myenb kapq zunq Zauj apg-ne penj yetg kwanb sruq Jyenq yetg nxm Bovb nivq kub vwaaig.

20.18: yo-aapg kxvq, “yia mwavj Eei.” uaq taub msia'q txn kxvq, “lob Nxi myenb maaib Jruj waag kxvq, ‘xij hiuq haiq Euvg xij zu'g mivb aa-Ben naaig.’ ninb Bua zyrug haib Zaavb laavb tu'q hxpg Eei.
20.8: ninb Bua Tauj ki-Be-on Eei tomb la'pyeiq uaq, aa-maa-saaj taaib pwavb ninb Bua. uaq zang yo-aapg zu'q Jyenq Bx'q Jaaj Eei lwib hruj. ninb sai Jyenq hrub Laav, Ru'g Daauq Tapq Jyenq Paiq Zipq Jyenq hrub Laav. yo-aapg yavb Jauq uaq zang Ru'g yem Paiq Zwrtq Dxtq Dau.
20.3: Daa-witq Rwrnj Tauj ye-lu-saa-lem, ninb kanb Eei huvb ting uaq. tovb ninb zinb Daavg kwavg Jyenq kruj huvb ting uaq teij zyepg taub Jaab zeib auq, ninb pun ninb Bua kanb yem nxm pyauq yaag pun myenb zuaq Jyenq. ninb pun ninb Bua Qyemj lovg Eei ka'naaiq mq paag maiq Zauj ninb Bua pweij. ninb Bua yetg seij zu'g wrnj Jyenq zyrug yem Navq aub kwaaq nx.
20.21: naaiq maiq zeid yia Bua Eei za'eij. mq paag maaib taub e-faa-im Bovb aiq txvj Eei myenb, se Bikg-li Eei txn, Qe-Baa. ninb suv puad vcvg Daa-witq huvb. sij kxvq meib zx'q ninb Du'g taub myenb pun yia, yia zyrug leib Gxi naaiq nxm zivb a'q.” uaq taub msia'q txn kxvq Buaj yo-aapg, “yia Bua zx'q naaiq taub myenb Eei mGxvq zxi pun meib.”
20.14: Qe-Baa Jiaj fivb fivj i-saa-laa-en myenb Eei txvj, ninb mivb Tauj aa-Ben-Betg-maa-aa-Kaa yaag mivb kxmj Be-le-yaa myenb Eei teig. Be-le-yaa myenb kapq zunq taaib kan Qe-Baa mivb.
20.23: yo-aapg zruj i-saa-laa-en Eei zwavj Junb pcv Eei tomb pcvb pyeiq. ye-ho-yaa-Daa Eei txn, Be-nai-yaa kunq Ke-le-Ti Zauj Pe-letq myenb.
20.6: Daa-witq kxvq Buaj aa-Bi-Qai, “ib zang Bikg-li Eei txn, Qe-Baa, xij hxig yia Bua kaub Zamq apg-saa-lom hxig. txb meib Eei zyruq Eei pru mivb zung ninb. Riaj ninb haib lxd tu'q weib wrnq Eei zivb zyrug pyauj Dutq yia Bua.”
20.2: i-saa-laa-en Eei zwavj myenb zyrug kwavg Daa-witq mivb kan Bikg-li Eei txn, Qe-Baa. mq paag yu-Daa myenb zyepg zua'q Eei kan Daa-witq, yem Jx-Dcn Daaib mivb Tauj ye-lu-saa-lem.
20.20: yo-aapg tau, “yia maiq Namq Tauj, za'kevb maiq Namq Tauj. yia zuvq maiq myetg, maiq paaig waaig meib Bua Eei zivb.
20.24: aa-Do-ni-lam kunq zruj kov Kruq Eei myenb. aa-hi-lutq Eei txn, ye-ho-saa-fatq, zruj fiaq srub taan Eei myenb.
20.7: yo-aapg Zauj ninb Eei myenb, Zauj Ke-le-Ti myenb Zauj Pe-letq myenb Zauj henq haig Eei Junb pcv kan Jyenq aa-Bi-Qai yem ye-lu-saa-lem Zwrtq mivb zung Bikg-li Eei txn, Qe-Baa.
20.19: yia Bua naaiq nxm zivb Eei myenb se Namq pcvb xn Zauj zyepg zua'q Eei Jauq. meib taaq za'eij myetg nxm zivb, naaiq se yetg nxm yem i-saa-laa-en Eei tomb zivb. meib weig haiq tiug xij na'q zyruq Eei pwrng?”
20.17: yo-aapg zyrug mivb fatq. uaq taub msia'q txn naaig, “meib se yo-aapg saa'b?” yo-aapg tau, “zeid Eei.” uaq taub msia'q txn kxvq, “Toq mwavj meib Eei msia'q pru Eei waag.”
20.11: maaib yetg taub yo-aapg Eei myenb sruq Jyenq aa-maa-saaj Eei sei ka'Len kxvq, “haiq taub a'Neiq yo-aapg Zauj haiq taub pia'g Daa-witq, xij zu'g kan yo-aapg mivb a'q.”
20.5: aa-maa-saaj zyrug mivb heug yu-Daa myenb, mq paag ninb zaib Jiaj Daavg huvb tiaj tivg taaib Eei Nxib Eia'g.
20.9: yo-aapg kxvq Buaj aa-maa-saaj, “yia Eei kxj aag, meib lovj Eei saa'b?” yo-aapg zyrug lovg ninb Eei Byaaug Jia'q puad nanq aa-maa-saaj Eei syaam xij zom ninb.
20.16: maaib taub yem zivb maaib Zovb mevb Eei msia'q txn heug Jyenq kxvq, “mwavj maa'b! mwavj maa'b! Toq pun yo-aapg taaib naaiq. yia xij Zauj ninb kxvq waag.”
20.4: Daa-witq kxvq Buaj aa-maa-saaj, “mivb heug yu-Daa myenb pua Nxi ka'Euad taaib kapq zunq yem naaiq. meib kanb yaag Zauj Jyenq taaib.”
20.10: aa-maa-saaj maiq Javj mavg yo-aapg Eei puad nanq Eei Ru'g Daauq. yo-aapg Ropq aa-maa-saaj Eei ka'sia, Jaavb pctq Zwrtq Fiag Dau. zuvq maiq zu'g Ropq ta'Eeig Rung. aa-maa-saaj taig mig a'q. yo-aapg Zauj ninb Eei yrud, aa-Bi-Qai zyrug zung Jyenq Bikg-li Eei txn, Qe-Baa.
20.22: uaq taub msia'q txn lovg ninb Eei Zovb mevb mivb Zauj zwavj myenb Zaavb laavb. ninb Bua zyrug Va'q Bikg-li Eei txn, Qe-Baa, Eei mGxvq Dutq cvj zxi yavb zivb laatg kub vwaaig pun yo-aapg. yo-aapg zyrug pyomq Jxv. zwavj pcv zyrug Raanj mivb, kx'g myenb Rwrnj kx'g myenb Eei pyauq. yo-aapg yaag Rwrnj ye-lu-saa-lem, huvb tiaj uaq.
20.12: aa-maa-saaj Eei sei yem tomb Jauq pweij Jyenq Ryaamb Dxvb ka'Euad. haiq taub Jiaj Jauq pwatg zyrug sruq Jyenq uaq. uaq taub myenb pwatg myenb Navq naaiq nx tivb, ninb zyrug Tx sei mivb kwavg uaq lomb Waav, lovg lwi komq Jyenq.
20.15: yo-aapg Zauj ninb Eei Junb pcv zyrug taaib weib Jyenq xij Bx'q aa-Ben-Betg-maa-aa-Kaa, tovb Qe-Baa yem Eei zivb. ninb Bua yem zivb ka'Eiag tinb nia faauj zivb laatg ka'Len cvj lovg Bx'q Jaaj Eei Jaab sig zov zivb laatg, xij zov Tauj Baav.
20.13: zx'q Gxi sei, Ga'haaq zwavj myenb kan Jyenq yo-aapg mivb zung Bikg-li Eei txn, Qe-Baa.
20.1: yem uaq maaib taub Zua'q sig Eei myenb, se Ben-yaa-min myenb, Bikg-li Eei txn, Qe-Baa. ninb pyomq Jxv heug Jyenq kxvq, “yia Bua Zauj Daa-witq maiq maaib yia Bua Eei pwrng. yem Jyetg-si Eei txn yaag maiq maaib yia Bua Ripg Eei pwrng. o i-saa-laa-en myenb aag, kx'g myenb Rwrnj kx'g myenb Eei pyauq maa'b!”
20.26: Jaa-i myenb, i-laa, yaag zruj Daa-witq Eei sai myenb.
20.25: Qe-waa zruj srub piuq, saaj-Dokg Zauj aa-Bi-yaa-Taa zruj sai myenb.

24.18: tovb uaq Nxi kaatg mivb lxd Daa-witq yaag kxvq Buaj ninb, “meib xij zu'g mivb ye-Butg myenb, aa-laau-naa, Eei Bx'q Byaub Zyavq weig zyruq Zeij nxm ziab txvb.”
24.8: ninb Bua mivb kxmj teib puv liud, zyrug Rwrnj ye-lu-saa-lem. ninb Bua lovg Duab Laaj Zauj Eig zyepg Nxi.
24.3: mq paag yo-aapg kxvq Buaj huvb tiaj, “Toq zyruq, meib Eei Tinb huvb, pun pc'g fivj Jaa Yaavj kaub Zamq ib zang maaib Eei yetg pc'q kruq, pun yia Eei zyruq, huvb tiaj, Eei mziv tu'q pwatg. mq paag yia Eei zyruq huvb tiaj weig haiq tiug zruj naaiq teij sig?”
24.21: aa-laau-naa kxvq, “yia Eei zyruq, huvb tiaj, weig haiq tiug taaib lxd yia, meib Eei pru?” Daa-witq tau, “yia taaib maaid meib Eei Bx'q Byaub Zyavq weig zyruq Zeij nxm ziab txvb pun pc'g fivj putq Eei tomb wrnb pcvg haib tivb.”
24.14: Daa-witq kxvq Buaj kaatg, “yia kevb haid a'g haig. yia Toq yem zyruq Eei puad weig zu'g ninb za'kevb Kxb lyenb haig myenb, mq paag Toq maiq tuvq pun yia zu'g yem paamb myenb Eei puab Diaq.”
24.23: o huvb tiaj aa'b! naaiq yetg zuvq yia, aa-laau-naa, fuvj pun meib a'q.” aa-laau-naa cvj Jaa waag kxvq, “Toq zyruq, meib Eei Tinb huvb, hxpg Hruq huvb tiaj.”
24.6: ninb Bua taaib Tauj ki-le-aatg cvj mivb Tauj taa-Tim-hotg-Qi. ninb Bua cvj mivb Tauj Dan-yaa-an, wivg mivb Tauj sai-Dxn.
24.2: Daa-witq zyrug kxvq Buaj yo-aapg cvj Zauj ninb yem Eei tomb pcvb pyeiq, “mivb kxmj fivb fivj i-saa-laa-en myenb, yem Daan Tauj Be-e-Qe-Baa, saauq myenb weig pun yia hiuq tu'q pc'g fivj Eei sruj mrug.”
24.20: aa-laau-naa mavg pwatg huvb tiaj Zauj ninb Eei Jyen huvj Jyenq ninb taaib, ninb Zwrtq mivb yem huvb tiaj Eei Ra'Myen Baapq Fiag, Myen Tauj Dau.
24.24: mq paag huvb tiaj kxvq Buaj aa-laau-naa, “maiq zeid lx'g. yia xij ziuj Jaab zinb Tevj meib maaid. yia maiq xij lovg pc'g pc'g tu'q taaib Eei ka'naaiq fovg hxg puaq ziag pun zyruq, yia Eei Tinb huvb.” Daa-witq zyrug lovg zyepg Mmd luvd Eaanb maaid Bx'q Byaub Zyavq Zauj vovb.
24.7: ninb Bua cvj Tauj weib wrnq Eei zivb, Tai-la'q, cvj mivb Tauj hi-wai myenb Zauj Kaa-naa-an myenb Eei nxmb nxm zivb. Ga'haaq laai ninb Bua Tauj yu-Daa Eei ne-kepg teig, Be-e-Qe-Baa uaq nxm txvj.
24.19: Daa-witq zyrug ei Jyenq zyruq lovg kaatg hatg Eei waag mivb a'q.
24.17: Daa-witq pwatg taij myenb uaq taub finb myenb ninb kxvq Buaj zyruq, “se tovb yia paamd zwid. se tovb yia zruj txvg. naaiq teij pa'ki yuvb maiq zruj haiq Euvg. Toq pun meib Eei puad zu'g yia Zauj yia Eei Mwavq txig Navq.”
24.11: ta'Eeig Dxm Daa-witq Jiad sin taaib, Daa-witq Eei trug waag myenb, kaatg, tu'q zipq zyruq Eei waag mig a'q.
24.5: ninb Bua Jiaj liud Jx-Dcn Daaib zyrug lyepg Zyavq yem aa-lo-e zivb, tovb yem hxvd ka'Euad Eei naamb puv zivb. ninb Bua cvj huvj Jyenq kaatg cvj Jiaj mivb Tauj yaa-se.
24.9: yo-aapg zyrug mivb Buaj Daa-witq ninb saauq pc'g fivj Eei sruj mrug. yem i-saa-laa-en haib lovg Ru'g Daauq yaag zruj henq Eei pcv maaib petq zyepg waang taub. yu-Daa maaib Mmd zyepg waang.
24.16: finb myenb suv puad xij myetg ye-lu-saa-lem uaq zang, zyruq zyrug kxiq za'eij mig a'q. ninb kxvq Buaj myetg myenb uaq taub finb myenb, “kauj a'q. Lwrtq meib Eei puad maa'b!” uaq zang zyruq Eei finb myenb sruq Jyenq yem ye-Butg myenb, aa-laau-naa, Eei Bx'q Byaub Zyavq.
24.4: mq paag yo-aapg Zauj tomb pcvb pyeiq vcvg maiq tu'q huvb tiaj Eei waag. yo-aapg Zauj Junb pcv Eei tomb pcvb pyeiq zyrug yem huvb Eei Ra'Myen Zwrtq mivb saauq i-saa-laa-en myenb Eei pc'g fivj.
24.10: Daa-witq saauq liud myenb, ninb haid Hruq maiq lovj. ninb zyrug kxvq Buaj zyruq, “yia Navq naaiq nx zruj yia paamd zwid Lo haig. mq paag zyruq aag, Toq meib kwavg yia, meib Eei pru Eei zwid, weig zu'g yia zruj naaiq teij sig za'kevb Vovj haig.”
24.22: aa-laau-naa kxvq Buaj Daa-witq, “yia Eei zyruq, huvb tiaj, pwatg haiq Euvg a'Neiq lovg, kunq zx'q taaib lovg ziag. mavg maa'b! naaiq maaib vovb weig zruj puaq ziag Eei ka'naaiq. cvj maaib vovb Eei Dyavb kaad Zauj Bx'q Byaub Eei ka'naaiq weig zruj zaavb.
24.12: ninb kxvq, “mivb Buaj Daa-witq, ‘zyruq Navq naaiq kxvq. yia maaib pua Euvg pun meib kinq. meib kinq haiq Euvg, yia zyrug zruj uaq Euvg pun meib.’+”
24.15: Navq naaig, yem luvb Dxm Tauj tivg taaib Eei zyavb hog, zyruq pun i-saa-laa-en myenb putq tomb wrnb pcvg. yem Daan Tauj Be-e-Qe-Baa maaib siag waang taub i-saa-laa-en myenb taig.
24.13: kaatg zyrug mivb lxd Daa-witq, Buaj ninb, “zyruq Navq naaiq nx kxvq, ‘meib xij pun meib Eei teib puv zu'g pua Havj Eei tomb vxg fai? fai xij zu'g meib Eei winb wavq zung pyauj pua Laaj Eia'g? fai meib Eei teib puv xij zu'g maaib pua Nxi Eei tomb wrnb pcvg?’ ib zang Namq mavg kaaj, yia xij zu'g Navq haiq nx tau Paaiq yia taaib uaq taub?’+”
24.1: zyruq cvj Qiaj! Jiad haig i-saa- laa-en myenb zyrug Zo'q Daa-witq hxig ninb Bua. ninb Buaj Daa-witq, “mivb saauq i-saa-laa-en Zauj yu-Daa myenb maa'b!”
24.25: Daa-witq yem uaq weig zyruq Zeij nxm ziab txvb, cvj fovg hxg puaq ziag Zauj ziag weig Jiu Tov Eei ka'naaiq. weig naaiq, zyruq mwavj weig uaq nxm teib puv Toq Eei waag. yem i-saa-laa-en putq Eei tomb wrnb pcvg zyrug tivb mig a'q.

7.18: Daa-witq huvb zyrug pia'g mivb zweid Jyenq zyruq Eei Ra'Myen kxvq, “o zyruq Tinb huvb aag, yia se tovb haiq taub, yia Eei Mwavq txig yaag funj penj haiq Euvg, meib Zivj taaib zruj Dovg naaiq lovj pun yia?
7.8: “+‘ib zang Buaj yia Eei pru, Daa-witq, “nrnb Jiaj Eei zyruq Navq naaiq nx kxvq, ‘yia zx'q meib yem yuvb Zyavq puvj pa'ki yuvb Eei zyavb hog Zwrtq taaib lyepg meib zruj yia Eei pc'g fivj, i-saa-laa-en myenb, Eei huvb.
7.3: naa-Tan kxvq Buaj huvb tiaj, “meib kunq ziuj meib Eei Hruq xij zruj Eei mivb zruj, weig zu'g zyruq Zauj meib yem.”
7.21: meib zruj naaiq teij yetg zuvq Lo Eei sig, yaag pun meib Eei pru hiuq se weig meib lcvd Eei waag, yaag ziuj meib kanb Eei eij.
7.14: yia xij zruj ninb Eei tia. ninb yaag xij zruj yia Eei txn. sij kxvq ninb paamd zwid, yia zuvq lovg paamb myenb Eei pyaaq Bx'q Faauj ninb, se lovg paamb myenb Eei pyaab pin Bx'q.
7.23: cvj maaib haiq fivj Navq meib Eei pc'g fivj, i-saa-laa-en myenb? yem luvb Diaq se tovb naaiq Du'g fivj Navq, tovb Tinb huvb Zwrtq mivb weig ninb kanb zua'g Rwrnj zruj kanb Eei pc'g fivj, yaag weig kanb tu'q mevb taub Lo. meib zua'g ninb Bua yem i-yipq teib puv Zwrtq yaag zruj tomb Bua'g hxvb Eei sig, yem meib Eei pc'g fivj Eei uaq Daavg mcvj zung Zwrtq kanb fivj myenb Zauj ninb Bua Eei zyenb.
7.6: yem yia txb i-saa- laa-en myenb Zwrtq i-yipq Tauj ib Nxi yia maiq yem Jiaj yetg nxm pyauq. yia yem Eei txvj se Dopg liub, swiq Jiaj mivb Jiaj taaib.
7.2: uaq zang huvb tiaj kxvq Buaj trug waag myenb, naa-Tan, “mavg maa'b! yia yem sij-Daa zovb Dyavj zruj taaib Eei ting mq paag Tinb huvb Eei lcvd vcvg waag faav yem Dopg liub.”
7.20: “o zyruq Tinb huvb aag, meib Dovg naaiq Taaib meib Eei pru, yia, Daa-witq, haib Jaa kxvq haiq Euvg? weig zu'g meib hiuq tu'q yia, meib Eei pru.
7.24: meib weig kanb lyepg i-saa-laa-en myenb yetg liud zruj meib Eei pc'g fivj. o zyruq aag, meib tu'q zruj ninb Bua Eei Tinb huvb.
7.28: o zyruq Tinb huvb aag, meib se Tinb huvb. meib Eei waag se zyen Eei. meib yaag lcvd naaiq teij lovj Eei sig pun yia, meib Eei pru.
7.7: ta'faanb yia Zauj i-saa-laa-en Eei zwavj myenb swiq Jiaj Eei txvj, yia maiq tu'q Buaj Jiaj i-saa-laa-en Eei tomb Jyen, tovb yia Paaiq zyavj kruj yia Eei pc'g fivj, i-saa-laa-en, Eei haiq taub, ‘meib weig haiq tiug maiq lovg sij-Daa zovb Dyavj Zeij nxm ting pun yia?’+”
7.29: weig naaiq Toq meib a'Neiq Zeij fu'q pun yia, meib Eei pru Eei zeib fun, weig pun ninb Bua yetg liud tu'q yem meib Eei Ra'Myen. o zyruq Tinb huvb aag, meib zuvq kxvq Zwrtq waag Zeij fu'q pun yia, meib Eei pru, Eei zeib fun yaag xij Zeij fu'q pun ninb Bua Tauj yetg liud.”
7.19: o zyruq Tinb huvb aag, ziuj meib mavg naaiq se faib fiuq sig. meib yaag kxvq Tauj meib Eei pru Eei hod txig zeib fun. o zyruq Tinb huvb aag, meib yetg kau Navq naaiq nx Tevj myenb fai?
7.17: naa-Tan ziuj naaiq teij yetg zuvq waag Zauj yetg zuvq laaug yaavb Eei sig kxvq Buaj Daa-witq.
7.27: “o nrnb Jiaj Eei zyruq, i-saa-laa-en Eei Tinb huvb aag, meib laaug yaavb pun yia, meib Eei pru. meib kxvq, ‘yia xij lyepg meib Eei hod txig zeib fun.’ weig naaiq yia, meib Eei pru, puvj laavg Eei yem meib Eei Ra'Myen Navq naaiq nx tauj kauj.
7.11: yaag maiq Navq yia Paaiq tomb Jyen kunq i-saa-laa-en myenb Eei zyavb hog. yia yaag xij pun meib tu'q Taaib pcvb, maiq zu'g meib Eei yetg zuvq winb wavq hxig. “+‘+“zyruq yaag kxvq Buaj meib, zyruq xij Zeij hod txig zeib fun pun meib.
7.5: “mivb Buaj yia Eei pru, Daa-witq, ‘zyruq Navq naaiq nx kxvq, “meib za'kevb xij Zeij nxm pyauq pun yia yem fai?
7.9: maiq kunq meib mivb haaij, yia Zauj meib yem. meib Eei yetg zuvq winb wavq yem meib Eei uaq Daavg mcvj yia Pai kwavg mig a'q. yia xij pun meib tu'q mevb taub Lo, Dovg luvb Diaq maaib mevb taub Lo Jiaj Eei myenb.
7.16: yia pun meib Eei trub zov Zauj meib Eei kua'q tu'q yem yia Eei Ra'Myen yetg liud wrnq. meib Eei huvb weig yaag xij lyepg wrnq Tauj yetg liud.”+’+”
7.4: mq paag tovb uaq mwrnd naa-Tan zipq zyruq Eei waag kxvq,
7.10: yia xij pun nxm txvj yia Eei pc'g fivj, i-saa-laa-en myenb, yem, yaag lyepg ninb Bua yem uaq weig penj ninb Bua kanb Eei txvj, maiq zu'g cvj Eauq Hruq. myenb x'q myenb yaag maiq tu'q cvj taaib hxig ninb Bua Navq zinb Daavg uaq nx,
7.22: “o zyruq Tinb huvb aag, ziuj yia Bua kanb Eei mnxmb haid, meib se Lo haig. maiq maaib haiq taub Navq meib. Zwrtq liud meib, maiq maaib kanb taub Tinb huvb.
7.12: meib Eei Nxib Eia'g pwavq, meib zyrug kwei seij mig a'q. yia xij pun meib Eei txn, se meib kanb Eei Zyen txn, tu'q Ripg Jyenq meib zruj huvb. yia yaag xij lyepg ninb Eei kua'q wrnq.
7.15: mq paag yia xij yetg liud zyepg zua'q Eei Namq ninb, maiq Navq yia zx'q Rwrnj maiq Namq tovb yia Twij Gxi yem Daavg meib uaq taub sau-lo.
7.13: ninb zuvq xij weig yia Eei mevb Zeij nxm pyauq. yia yaag xij lyepg ninb Eei kua'q Eei huvb weig Tauj yetg liud.
7.1: huvb tiaj tu'q yem ninb kanb Eei ting, zyruq pun ninb tu'q hitq Kwrnj, maiq zu'g weib kxmj Eei winb wavq taaib hxig.
7.26: Toq pun myenb yetg liud Zev meib Eei mevb weib Lo. ninb Bua zyrug kxvq, ‘nrnb Jiaj Eei zyruq se kunq i-saa-laa-en Eei Tinb huvb.’ meib Eei pru, Daa-witq, Eei trub zov yaag tu'q yem meib Eei Ra'Myen lyepg wrnq.
7.25: “o zyruq Tinb huvb aag, Toq zx'q meib weig yia, meib Eei pru, Zauj yia Eei zeib fun lcvd Eei waag lyepg wrnq Tauj yetg liud. Toq meib ei Jyenq meib kxvq Eei waag zruj.

19.18: ninb Bua zyrug yem Jaub prug Jiaj mivb zipq huvb tiaj yaag ei Jyenq huvb tiaj Eei Hruq zruj. huvb tiaj Javb Jav xij Jiaj Daaib Eei zyavb hog, ke-laa Eei txn, si-me-i, Pua'q Fiag huvb tiaj Eei Ra'Myen
19.8: huvb tiaj zyrug Jiad sin taaib Zwrtq mivb zweid Jyenq zivb kcvb. uaq teij myenb haid kxvq, “huvb tiaj zweid Jyenq zivb kcvb.” zwavj myenb zyrug taaib yem ninb Eei Ra'Myen. i-saa-laa-en myenb, kx'g myenb pyauj Jyenq Rwrnj kx'g myenb Eei pyauq.
19.33: huvb tiaj kxvq Buaj Baa-sin-lai, “Zauj yia Jiaj mivb cvj Zauj yia yem ye-lu-saa-lem yia zyrug ziuj kruj meib.”
19.3: uaq Nxi zwavj myenb sekg sekq Eei Rwrnj taaib pia'g zivb Navq Bx'q Jaaj pivj Jyenq pyauj, Eaiq haig Eei myenb nx.
19.32: Baa-sin-lai koj haig, Havb Jeiq tu'q petq zyepg Havj. huvb tiaj yem maa-haa-naa-im uaq zang, Baa-sin-lai txb Eang hopq taaib pun huvb tiaj weig zu'g Baa-sin-lai putq zxib haig.
19.21: uaq zang sej-lu-yaa Eei txn, aa-Bi-Qai, kxvq, “si-me-i zyruj zyruq lovg yrub xn taaib Eei myenb. maiq hxpg zu'g taij taig fai?”
19.35: yia ib zang tu'q petq zyepg Havj a'q. yia haib pun tu'q Gxi haiq Euvg se yaaug fai maiq yaaug? yia haib seij Zwrtq haiq Euvg Eang hopq Kuq fai maiq Kuq? yia Zxg haib mwavj tu'q haid mJavg msia'q paauj Ruv Eei fai? Navq naaig yia, meib Eei pru, weig haiq tiug xij zu'g pun yia Eei zyruq, huvb tiaj, Jaa la'Eauq?
19.43: i-saa-laa-en myenb tau yu-Daa myenb, “yia Bua Zauj huvb tiaj maaib zyepg kruq Eei pwrng. yia Bua maaib leid tu'q Daa-witq kaub Zamq meib Bua. uaq Euvg meib Bua weig haiq tiug mavg Piaj yia Bua? yia Bua kxvq Daavg xij txb yia Bua Eei huvb tiaj Rwrnj maiq zeid?” mq paag yu-Daa myenb Eei waag kaub vcvg i-saa-laa-en myenb Eei.
19.40: huvb tiaj cvj Jiaj mivb Tauj kin-kaan. Kim-haam yaag kan ninb Jiaj. yu-Daa Eei zwavj myenb Zauj yetg pwrng i-saa-laa-en myenb fuvj huvb tiaj Jiaj.
19.14: Daa-witq Eei waag pcv tu'q yu-Daa Eei zwavj myenb tovb tiug Hruq. ninb Bua zyrug Paaiq myenb mivb Buaj huvb tiaj, “Toq huvb tiaj Zauj huvb tiaj Eei yetg zuvq Jyen Rwrnj taaib.”
19.23: huvb tiaj kxvq Buaj si-me-i, “meib maiq zu'g taig.” huvb tiaj zyrug Zauj ninb hruq waag lcvd.
19.6: weig zu'g meib Namq Rxv meib uaq teij myenb. Namq meib uaq teij, meib yaag Rxv. meib ib Nxi zruj tu'q mevb Eei. meib maiq funj meib Eei pcvb pyeiq Zauj meib Eei Jyen lovg Jyenq. ib Nxi yia pwatg tu'q mevb Eei. sij kxvq apg-saa-lom ib Nxi Zxg zyavb Jyenq, yia Bua yetg zuvq zu'g taig, meib a'Neiq Eei.
19.34: mq paag Baa-sin-lai Buaj huvb tiaj, “yia Zxg haib zyavb tu'q Bu'ziaj Havj weig pun yia haib tu'q Zauj huvb tiaj yem ye-lu-saa-lem fai?
19.2: uaq Nxi zwavj pc'g fivj tu'q hivb Eei Fyenb yrub Tiuq penj Raub Eyemq Eei Jauq weig zu'g uaq Nxi pc'g fivj haid kxvq, “huvb tiaj Hruq mun, Raub haig ninb Eei txn.”
19.36: yia, meib Eei pru, Kuvj fuvj huvb tiaj Jiaj Jx-Dcn Daaib mivb trug Jauq maiq ko. huvb tiaj weig haiq tiug xij pun zivb Eeig yia Dovg naaiq Lo?
19.20: weig zu'g yia, meib Eei pru, hiuq tu'q yia zruj txvg zwid. weig naaiq yem yo-sepq Eei zeib fun yia ib Nxi zruj ta'yetq taub taaib zipq yia Eei zyruq, huvb tiaj.”
19.24: sau-lo Eei fun, me-fi-Bo-setq, yaag taaib zipq huvb tiaj. yem huvb tiaj Zwrtq ye-lu-saa-lem Tauj pcvb xn Eei Rwrnj taaib uaq Nxi, me-fi-Bo-setq maiq Raauj zauj, maiq Teij syaam, maiq Roj lwib hruj.
19.28: yia Eei ov Eei zeib fun zig tu'q yia Eei zyruq, huvb tiaj, taij Navq. mq paag meib pun yia, meib Eei pru, Jwavg meib Eei tiab Eang Naavj. yia maiq maaib haiq Euvg leid cvj Tevj huvb tiaj Toq haiq Euvg.”
19.7: ib zang Toq meib Zwrtq mivb Zauj meib Eei Jyen kxvq waag lovj. yia zyavq Jyenq zyruq kxvq, sij kxvq meib maiq Navq naaig zruj, ib mwrnd maiq maaib yetg taub myenb Zauj meib yem naaiq. naaiq teij sig zyrug weig meib kaub Kruq meib zruj myenb lunj myenb Tauj ib zang pwavb Eei ze'g naang.”
19.29: huvb tiaj kxvq, “meib kxvq Bua'g naaiq kauj a'q. yia tivg pun meib Zauj si-Baa pun Gxi sau-lo Eei Dau a'q.”
19.19: kxvq, “yia Eei zyruq aag, Toq maiq tuvq lovg yia Eei zwid. yia Eei zyruq, huvb tiaj, Zwrtq ye-lu-saa-lem uaq Nxi yia zruj Eei zwid, Toq maiq tuvq Javj. Toq huvb tiaj maiq tuvq Yetq Hruq.
19.17: cvj maaib yetg Zin taub Ben-yaa-min myenb Zauj Jyenq ninb taaib. cvj maaib sau-lo Eei pyauq Eei pru, si-Baa, Zauj ninb Eei zyepg Mmd taub txn, Eig zyepg taub pru. ninb Bua zyrug syepg syepq Eei mivb Tauj Jx-Dcn Daaib txij huvb tiaj yem Eei txvj.
19.38: huvb tiaj kxvq, “kunq pun Kim-haam Zauj yia Jiaj. ziuj meib pwatg hxpg, yia zyrug Navq uaq nx Tevj ninb. meib xij yia Navq haiq nx zruj weig meib, yia zyrug Navq uaq nx zruj.”
19.31: ki-le-aatg myenb, Baa-sin-lai, yem lo-ke-lim Fiag taaib Zauj huvb tiaj mivb Tauj Jx-Dcn, xij fuvj huvb tiaj Fiag Daaib.
19.30: me-fi-Bo-setq kxvq Buaj huvb tiaj, “sweib si-Baa lovg Revg a'q. yia tu'q yia Eei zyruq, huvb tiaj, pcvb xn Eei Rwrnj Tauj huvb ting weig yia se kauj a'q.”
19.27: yia Eei pru kxvq Jaaq Buaj huvb tiaj. mq paag yia Eei zyruq, huvb tiaj, se Navq Tinb huvb Eei finb myenb. huvb tiaj pwatg haiq Euvg hxpg Hruq, huvb tiaj kunq Navq naaig zruj pun yia.
19.11: Daa-witq huvb Paaiq myenb mivb Buaj saaj-Dokg sai myenb Zauj aa-Bi-yaa-Taa sai myenb kxvq, “xij zu'g mivb Buaj yu-Daa Eei myenb koj, ‘meib Bua weig haiq tiug Tauj Ga'haaq laai Zivj Toq huvb tiaj Rwrnj ninb kanb Eei huvb ting? i-saa-laa-en Eei zwavj myenb zuvq maaib waag Toq huvb tiaj Rwrnj.
19.5: yo-aapg pia'g huvb ting kxvq Buaj huvb tiaj, “meib ib Nxi zruj pun meib Eei yetg zuvq Jyen zu'g Eaiq. ninb Bua ib Nxi Fruj meib Eei mcvg, Zauj meib Eei txn sia'q, meib Eei auq Zauj meib Eei Jaab zeib auq Bua Eei mcvg,
19.9: kxmj i-saa-laa-en teib puv Eei fivb fivj myenb, zwavj pc'g fivj laanb Zauj laanb Rcv kxvq, “huvb tiaj Fruj yia Bua pyauj Dutq yia Bua Eei winb wavq Eei puab Diaq, yaag Fruj yia Bua pyauj Dutq fi-li-saa-tia myenb Eei puab Diaq. mq paag ib zang ninb pyauj apg-saa-lom Zwrtq teib puv a'q.
19.16: yem Baa-hu-lim Eei Ben-yaa-min myenb, ke-laa Eei txn, si-me-i, Zauj Jyenq yu-Daa myenb syepg syepq Eei Fiag taaib zipq Daa-witq huvb.
19.41: Ga'haaq i-saa-laa-en Eei zwavj myenb taaib pwavb huvb tiaj, kxvq Buaj ninb, “yia Bua Eei kxb yrud, yu-Daa myenb, weig haiq tiug pivj Jyenq txb huvb tiaj Zauj huvb tiaj Eei pyauq zov myenb Zauj kan huvb tiaj Eei yetg zuvq myenb Jiaj Jx-Dcn Daaib?”
19.37: Toq pun yia, meib Eei pru, Rwrnj yem kanb Eei zivb kwei seij, zavj Jyenq yia Eei tiaj maag Eei zruq ka'Len. mq paag naaiq maaib huvb Eei pru, Kim-haam. kunq pun ninb Zauj yia Eei zyruq, huvb tiaj, Jiaj mivb. ziuj huvb tiaj pwatg haiq Euvg hxpg, kunq Navq uaq nx Tevj ninb.”
19.39: zwavj myenb zyrug Jiaj Jx-Dcn Daaib. huvb tiaj yaag Zauj Jyenq Jiaj. huvb tiaj zom Baa-sin-lai yaag pwav waag pun ninb. Ga'haaq Baa-sin-lai Rwrnj ninb kanb Eei pyauq mig a'q.
19.4: huvb tiaj pwav Jyenq Myen Eyemq Bwi Eei kxvq, “o yia Eei txn, apg-saa-lom aa'b! apg-saa-lom, yia Eei txn, yia Eei txn aa'b!”
19.10: yia Bua lovg yrub xn apg-saa-lom zruj huvb kunq yia Bua mq paag ninb yem Bx'q Jaaj Eei zyavb hog taig mig a'q. uaq Euvg meib Bua weig haiq tiug maiq kxvq yetg Jruj Tauj xij txb huvb tiaj Rwrnj?”
19.22: Daa-witq tau, “sej-lu-yaa Eei i taub txn aa'b! yia Zauj meib Bua maaib haiq Euvg kwen zu'g fai? ib Nxi meib Bua tu'q zruj yia Eei winb wavq. ib Nxi yem i-saa-laa-en hxpg zu'g maaib haiq taub zu'g taij taig fai? yia ib Nxi maiq hiuq tu'q yia zruj i-saa-laa-en Eei huvb fai?”
19.12: meib Bua zruj yia Eei kxb yrud, Jwavg Ryaamb fei Eei myenb. uaq Euvg meib Bua weig haiq tiug zruj Ga'haaq laai Eei myenb txb huvb tiaj Rwrnj?’
19.42: yu-Daa Eei zwavj myenb tau i-saa-laa-en myenb, “weig zu'g huvb tiaj se Zauj yia Bua Zyen. meib Bua weig haiq tiug laaij naaiq teij sig Qiaj Jiad? yia Bua tu'q pavg huvb tiaj Eang fai? huvb tiaj pun haiq Euvg zivb Eeig yia Bua Eei fai?”
19.15: huvb tiaj zyrug Rwrnj Tauj Jx-Dcn Daaib. yu-Daa myenb mivb Tauj kin-kaan, zipq huvb tiaj Jiaj Jx-Dcn Daaib.
19.13: cvj kxvq Buaj aa-maa-saaj, ‘meib Zauj yia Jwavg Ryaamb fei maiq zeid? sij kxvq yem naaiq mivb meib maiq tu'q tiq yo-aapg zruj yia Eei Junb pcv Eei pcvb pyeiq, Toq Tinb huvb Niab Niaq Eei tivg yia Eei zwid.’+”
19.1: maaib myenb Buaj yo-aapg, “huvb tiaj Eyemq yaag Raub apg-saa-lom.”
19.26: me-fi-Bo-setq kxvq, “o yia Eei zyruq, huvb tiaj aag, yia Eei pru Duaq yia. yia, meib Eei pru, Buaj ninb, ‘pwig lxb pun yia keb, weig pun yia keb Jyenq Zauj huvb tiaj mivb,’ weig zu'g yia, meib Eei pru, zauj Bai Eei.
19.25: me-fi-Bo-setq taaib Tauj ye-lu-saa-lem zipq huvb tiaj uaq zang, huvb tiaj naaig ninb, “me-fi-Bo-setq aag, meib weig haiq tiug maiq Zauj yia mivb?”

17.18: mq paag maaib taub myenb lunj myenb pwatg ninb Bua zyrug mivb Buaj apg-saa-lom. ninb Bua i taub zyrug kaanq Jyenq pyauj Tauj Baa-hu-lim, yetg taub myenb Eei pyauq. uaq taub myenb Eei laatg ka'Euad maaib nxm uamb Kwrtq. ninb Bua zyrug pia'g ka'Euad mivb.
17.8: hu-sai cvj kxvq, “meib hiuq tu'q meib Eei tia Zauj ninb Eei myenb se Bx'q Jaaj henq Eei myenb. ib zang ninb Bua Qiaj Jiad Navq yem lomb Waav Eei Jyepg Eeid, ninb Eei txn zu'g Zaavq mivb nx. maiq taan Bua'g naaiq. meib Eei tia se yetg taub Bx'q Jaaj henq Eei myenb. luvb mwrnd zang ninb maiq Zauj ninb Eei pcvb kwanb pweij.
17.3: cvj txb pc'g fivj Rwrnj taaib kwei meib Navq syavb Bwavd Rwrnj taaib lxd syavb laavb nx. sij kxvq meib lxd uaq taub myenb zu'g taig, meib zyrug tu'q yetg zuvq pc'g fivj Rwrnj. zevg Fiag Eei myenb zyrug pcvb xn Eei yem.”
17.21: apg-saa-lom Eei Jyen Rwrnj mivb, aa-hi-maa-atg Zauj yo-naa-Taan yem uamb Kwrtq Zwrtq taaib mivb Buaj Daa-witq. ninb Bua kxvq, “syepg syepq Eei Jiad sin taaib kaanq Jyenq Jiaj uaq vaang zi'g Daaib weig zu'g aa-hi-To-fen Navq naaiq Navq uaq Zaavb laavb hxig meib.”
17.14: apg-saa-lom Zauj i-saa-laa-en Eei zwavj myenb kxvq, “aan-Ki myenb, hu-sai, Eei za'eij se kaub lovj aa-hi-To-fen Eei.” weig zu'g zyruq tivg pun aa-hi-To-fen lovj Eei za'eij Dxtq weig pun apg-saa-lom zu'g Zyruq Eei ze'g naang.
17.23: aa-hi-To-fen pwatg myenb maiq ei ninb Eei za'eij, ninb zyrug zx'q keb xn pwig Jyenq lxb, keb Jyenq Rwrnj ninb Eei pyauq yem kanb Eei pwrnb muvq. ninb liug leid Euvb Euvg suv zyrug Diuj Jaav taig mig a'q. myenb txb ninb mivb zavj ninb Eei tia Eei zruq.
17.6: hu-sai taaib lxd apg-saa-lom uaq zang, apg-saa-lom Buaj ninb, “aa-hi-To-fen Navq naaiq nx kxvq. yia Bua ei ninb Eei za'eij zruj hxpg fai maiq hxpg? maiq hxpg nx, meib kxvq maa'b!”
17.2: ninb Kwrnj yaag Kruq Eei zyavb hog yia zyrug zung zaaig, hc'q ninb kamb Riaj. kan ninb uaq teij zwavj myenb zyrug pyauj Revg. yia zyrug taij huvb tiaj kanb Navq,
17.20: apg-saa-lom Eei Jyen taaib Tauj uaq taub msia'q txn Eei pyauq naaig, “aa-hi-maa-atg Zauj yo-naa-Taan yem haaij?” uaq taub msia'q txn tau, “ninb Bua Jiaj uaq vaang zi'g Daaib.” uaq teij myenb lxd mq paag lxd maiq pwatg haiq taub. ninb Bua zyrug Rwrnj ye-lu-saa-lem zivb mig a'q.
17.24: Daa-witq mivb Tauj maa-haa-naa-im. apg-saa-lom Zauj kan ninb Eei zwavj myenb yaag Jiaj uaq vaang zi'g Jx-Dcn Daaib.
17.28: txb Jyenq swavb timg, punb, lovg nia zruj taaib Eei Jaab txvj, Byaub witq Zauj Byaub Baa-li, Zauj Bwrnq, Zaauq taaib Eei Byaub, topg, topg si'q,
17.7: hu-sai kxvq Buaj apg-saa-lom, “naaiq Rung aa-hi-To-fen taaq za'eij maiq yaaug.”
17.29: mweib txvb, Exb Mei, pa'ki yuvb Zauj yem ninb Bua Eei scvb Kuq kwanb zruj taaib Eei Exb Meib vcvg pun Daa-witq Zauj kan ninb taaib Eei myenb Eang. weig zu'g ninb Bua kxvq, “naaiq teij myenb yem teib puvb Waav Hruq yaag sia, Jaav yaag Gaatq, ninb Bua Kruq haig a'q.”
17.19: uaq taub myenb Eei auq lxd Kwaaiq ka'naaiq komq Jyenq Kwrtg Rwib cvj zx'q Zu'q Pwi Jyenq kub vwaaig, yaag maiq maaib haiq taub hiuq.
17.17: uaq zang yo-naa-Taan Zauj aa-hi-maa-atg yem en-lo-ken zuaq. maaib taub msia'q pru aab log txb waag mivb Buaj ninb Bua, ninb Bua zyrug mivb Buaj Daa-witq huvb, weig zu'g ninb Bua kamb Riaj maiq pun myenb pwatg ninb Bua pia'g zivb.
17.27: Daa-witq Tauj maa-haa-naa-im Eei zyavb hog, maaib am-mon fivj, lapq-Baa myenb, naa-haatg Eei txn, so-Bi, Zauj lo-De-Baa myenb, am-mi-en, Eei txn, maa-Ki-le, Zauj ki-le-aatg teig Eei lo-ke-lim muvq Eei myenb, Baa-sin-lai,
17.11: “ziuj yia Eei za'eij, meib xij zu'g heug i-saa-laa-en Eei zwavj myenb, yem Daan Tauj Be-e-Qe-Baa Dovg Kxib Len Eei saab zyru Zamq, taaib zunq meib naaiq. meib kanb xij zu'g txb ninb Bua mivb Bx'q Jaaj.
17.5: mq paag apg-saa-lom kxvq, “mivb heug aan-Ki myenb, hu-sai, taaib, pun Bua mwavj kaaj ninb Navq haiq nx kxvq.”
17.9: taaij ib zang ninb zuvq pivj Jyenq yetg nxm Kwrtq fai kanb nxm txvj. Riaj ninb Eei pcv haib Bx'q meib Eei pcv Daavg. mwavj haid Eei myenb zyrug kxvq, ‘kan apg-saa-lom uaq teij pcv zu'g taij taig mig a'q.’
17.16: ib zang kaanq Paaiq myenb mivb Buaj Daa-witq ‘ib mwrnd maiq tuvq hitq pia'g teib puvb Waav Eei Jaub prug. Dovg haaij zuvq xij zu'g Jiaj Jx-Dcn Daaib. Riaj huvb tiaj Zauj kan ninb Eei yetg zuvq myenb zu'g na'q Revg.’+”
17.4: naaiq Euvg za'eij hxpg apg-saa-lom Zauj i-saa-laa-en Eei zwavj myenb koj Eei Hruq.
17.10: maiq kunq maaib myenb taamq Lo, se maaib Hruq Navq syenb Eei Hruq nx, ninb Bua zuvq kamb Riaj kau, Ba'Riu yu'g Revg, weig zu'g i-saa-laa-en Eei zwavj myenb hiuq tu'q meib Eei tia se Bx'q Jaaj henq Eei myenb. kan ninb uaq teij yaag zruj Bx'q Jaaj henq Eei pcv.
17.22: Daa-witq Zauj kan ninb Eei zwavj myenb zyrug Jiaj uaq vaang zi'g Jx-Dcn Daaib. Tauj luvb Fav yetg zuvq Jiaj Revg, maiq zevg yetg taub.
17.12: Navq naaig, yia Bua yem haiq Dau pwavb zu'g ninb, yia Bua zyrug Fiag Navq Byuvb swiq Fiag Dau. lyemb ninb Zauj kan ninb Eei myenb zyrug maiq lyrub yetg taub a'q.
17.15: hu-sai kxvq Buaj saaj-Dokg sai myenb Zauj aa-Bi-yaa-Taa sai myenb, “aa-hi-To-fen Zaavb laavb Buaj apg-saa-lom Zauj i-saa-laa-en Eei myenb koj Eei waag se Navq naaiq Navq uaq. yia kanb kxvq Eei za'eij se Navq naaiq Navq uaq.
17.13: sij kxvq ninb Twij pia'g nxm zivb ka'Euad, i-saa-laa-en Eei zwavj myenb zyrug txb Laav mivb Tx uaq nxm zivb Fiag hxvd, Tauj lyemb yetg nxm la'pyeib txn maiq pwatg yem uaq.”
17.1: aa-hi-To-fen cvj kxvq Buaj apg-saa-lom, “Toq pun yia kinq yetg waang i Zin taub pcv. ib mwrnd yia zyrug mivb zung Daa-witq.
17.26: apg-saa-lom Zauj i-saa-laa-en myenb lyepg Zyavq yem ki-le-aatg teig.
17.25: apg-saa-lom lyepg aa-maa-saaj zruj tomb pcvb pyeiq tiq yo-aapg. aa-maa-saaj se i-saa-maa-en myenb, Buaj heug itg-Taa-laa, Eei txn. itg-Taa-laa, lovg yo-aapg Eei maa, sej-lu-yaa, Eei Riad, se naa-haatg Eei sia'q, aa-Bi-kaa-yin.

11.18: yo-aapg Paaiq myenb mivb zx'q Bx'q Jaaj Eei yetg zuvq sig mivb Buaj Daa-witq.
11.8: Ga'haaq Daa-witq kxvq Buaj u-li-aa, “kunq Rwrnj meib Eei pyauq hitq tavb Kwrnj maa'b!” u-li-aa zyrug Zwrtq huvb ting. huvb tiaj yaag pun myenb txb zivb Eeig mivb fuvj pun ninb.
11.3: Daa-witq zyrug Paaiq myenb mivb mwavj kaaj naaiq taub msia'q txn Navq haiq nx. maaib taub myenb kxvq, “uaq taub msia'q txn se e-li-am Eei sia'q, Batg-Qe-Baa, hitq-Tai myenb, u-li-aa Eei auq.”
11.21: haiq taub taij ye-lupq-Be-setq Eei txn, aa-Bi-me-lekq? maiq zeid maaib taub msia'q txn yem zivb laatg kub vwaaig zxi kub vwaaig uaq mcvj mxg Fiag Bx'q ninb, ninb Zivj yem Te-Betg taig fai? meib Bua fuvg mivb nitq zivb laatg Dovg naaig fatq?’ sij kxvq huvb tiaj Navq naaiq nx naaig, meib xij zu'g Buaj ninb, ‘meib Eei pru, hitq-Tai myenb, u-li-aa, yaag taig mig a'q.’+”
11.14: ta'Eeig Dxm Daa-witq fiaq fyenj pun yo-aapg cvj pun u-li-aa txb mivb.
11.23: trug fyenj myenb kxvq Buaj Daa-witq, “winb wavq kaub henq Jiaj yia Bua yaag Zwrtq taaib yem uaq Daub Fav Zauj yia Bua Bx'q Jaaj, mq paag yia Bua zung ninb Bua Tauj zivb kcvb Daavg.
11.6: Daa-witq zyrug Paaiq myenb mivb yo-aapg uaq Buaj ninb, “fuvj hitq-Tai myenb, u-li-aa, taaib yia naaiq og.” yo-aapg zyrug fuvj u-li-aa mivb Daa-witq uaq.
11.2: maaib Nxi luvb maanb Mwavj, Daa-witq yem Zruj Jiad sin taaib faauj huvb ting Eei pyaub vxb kub vwaaig saau a'Ryaaug. yem pyaub vxb mavg Fiag, ninb pwatg taub msia'q txn Raauj Jyenq sin. uaq taub msia'q txn zyavb tu'q Rweig haig.
11.20: sij kxvq huvb tiaj Qiaj! Jiad haig, naaig meib, ‘meib Bua Bx'q Jaaj fuvg mivb nitq zivb laatg Dovg naaig fatq? meib Bua maiq hiuq tu'q ninb Bua xij yem zivb laatg pwrnq fxv fai?
11.24: pwrnq fxv Eei myenb yem zivb laatg kub vwaaig pwrnq huvb Eei Jyen. maaib teij huvb tiaj Eei Jyen taig mig a'q. maiq taan Bua'g naaiq. meib Eei pru, hitq-Tai myenb, u-li-aa, yaag taig mig a'q.”
11.7: u-li-aa taaib lxd ninb uaq zang, Daa-witq naaig kaaj, yo-aapg Navq haiq nx, pcv Navq haiq nx, Bx'q Jaaj Eei sig Navq haiq nx.
11.19: ninb Jaa waag trug fyenj myenb, “meib zx'q naaiq teij Bx'q Jaaj Eei yetg zuvq sig Buaj liud huvb tiaj.
11.17: zivb ka'Euad Eei myenb Zwrtq taaib Zauj yo-aapg Bx'q Jaaj. maaib teij Daa-witq Eei Jyen zu'g taig. hitq-Tai myenb, u-li-aa, yaag zu'g taij taig.
11.27: Raub Eyemq Eei zyavb hog Jiaj liud, Daa-witq Paaiq myenb mivb txb ninb taaib yem huvb ting. ninb zyrug zruj Daa-witq Eei auq yaag yuvd taub txn pun Daa-witq. mq paag Daa-witq zruj naaiq teij sig zyruq maiq hxpg Hruq.
11.11: u-li-aa kxvq Buaj Daa-witq, “lcvd vcvg waag faav Zauj yu-Daa myenb Zauj i-saa-laa-en myenb yem Dopg liub. yia Eei zyruq, yo-aapg, Zauj yia Eei zyruq Eei myenb yaag lyepg Zyavq yem lomb Waav. yia fuvg haib Rwrnj pyauq Eang, hopq cvj Zauj yia Eei auq pweij? yia zyavq Jyenq huvb tiaj Eei mcvg lcvd yia Dovg haaij zuvq maiq Navq naaig zruj.”
11.5: uaq taub msia'q txn zyrug maaib Jyenq sin a'q. ninb Paaiq myenb mivb Buaj Daa-witq, “yia maaib sin a'q.”
11.9: mq paag u-li-aa Zauj ninb Eei zyruq Eei zwavj Jyen pweij huvb ting Eei kcvb Daavg. ninb maiq Rwrnj ninb kanb Eei pyauq.
11.16: Navq naaig yo-aapg weib Jyenq zivb Eei zyavb hog ninb pun u-li-aa yem maaib winb wavq kaub henq Eei pcv yem Eei txvj.
11.4: Daa-witq Paaiq myenb mivb txb uaq taub msia'q txn taaib. ninb zyrug taaib lxd Daa-witq. Daa-witq yaag Zauj ninb pweij. (uaq zang Batg-Qe-Baa Eei sinb yeng Javb Jav Revg, ninb cvj saaj liud wij.) pweij liud, Batg-Qe-Baa Rwrnj ninb kanb Eei pyauq mig a'q.
11.10: maaib myenb Buaj Daa-witq, “u-li-aa maiq Rwrnj pyauq.” Daa-witq zyrug naaig u-li-aa, “meib yem ko Eei taaib maiq zeid? meib weig haiq tiug maiq Rwrnj pyauq?”
11.22: trug fyenj myenb zyrug mivb a'q. mivb Tauj Daa-witq uaq ninb ziuj yo-aapg Buaj ninb Eei waag zweib yetq zweib Eeig Eei kxvq Buaj huvb tiaj.
11.12: Daa-witq zyrug kxvq Buaj u-li-aa, “ib Nxi cvj yem Nxi naaiq, Fav Nxi yia pun meib Rwrnj.” uaq Nxi Zauj ta'Eeig Nxi, u-li-aa yem ye-lu-saa-lem zivb.
11.15: fyenj fiaq Jyenq kxvq, “pun u-li-aa yem Bx'q Jaaj kaub Niaq Jiaj Eei txvj uaq Daavg mcvj liud, meib Bua kunq Twij Zwrtq a'q, pun ninb zu'g taij taig a'q.”
11.13: Daa-witq heug u-li-aa taaib Zauj ninb Eang yaag hopq, pun ninb hopq tiuq Gwin. mq paag uaq mwrnd u-li-aa Zwrtq mivb yem ninb Eei zyruq Eei Jyen Bu'Dovj pweij ninb kanb Eei zi'g, mq paag ninb maiq Rwrnj pyauq.
11.1: Tauj Zunb ken Nxi, txij zu'g zwavj huvb tiaj yetg kau Zwrtq mivb Bx'q Jaaj Eei zyavb hog, Daa-witq Paaiq yo-aapg Zauj Jyenq ninb Eei zwavj Jyen Zauj i-saa-laa-en Eei yetg zuvq pcv Zwrtq mivb Bx'q Jaaj. ninb Bua Bx'q paaig am-mon myenb yaag weib Jyenq xij Bx'q lapq-Baa zivb. mq paag Daa-witq yem Jyenq ye-lu-saa-lem.
11.26: u-li-aa Eei auq haid kxvq ninb Eei Goj taig mig a'q, ninb weig ninb Eei Goj Raub Eyemq.
11.25: Daa-witq Buaj trug fyenj myenb, “meib xij zu'g Navq naaiq nx Buaj yo-aapg, ‘maiq tuvq pun naaiq teij sig Kwrnj meib Eei Hruq, weig zu'g Ru'g Daauq maiq kinq naaiq taub Zauj uaq taub. meib Bua xij zu'g Qa'q Bx'q uaq nxm zivb Tauj Bx'q paaig.’ xij zu'g Navq naaiq nx kxvq weig xn yo-aapg Eei Hruq.”

5.18: fi-li-saa-tia myenb taaib pun Raanj yem pwavq le-faa-im hxvd.
5.8: uaq Nxi Daa-witq kxvq, “haiq taub xij Bx'q ye-Butg myenb, xij zu'g yavb uamb zwrnj mivb Bx'q uaq teij zauj Bai Zauj mziv mcvb Eei myenb, tovb Daa-witq Rxv uaq teij myenb.” weig naaiq maaib kruq waag kxvq, “mziv mcvb Zauj zauj Bai Eei myenb maiq tu'q pia'g huvb ting.”
5.3: i-saa-laa-en myenb Eei zwavj myenb koj taaib Tauj he-Bo-lon, Daa-witq huvb uaq. Daa-witq zyrug Zauj ninb Bua lyepg Jiad vcvg waag. ninb Bua zyrug yem he-Bo-lon lovg yrub xn Daa-witq zruj huvb kunq i-saa-laa-en.
5.21: fi-li-saa-tia myenb kwavg Jyenq ninb Bua Eei miub favj uaq. Daa-witq Zauj ninb Eei myenb zyrug pyenb mivb Revg mig a'q.
5.14: yem naaiq mivb kxvq ninb yem ye-lu-saa-lem tu'q taaib Eei fu'Jweiq. maaib sam-mu-waa, so-Bapg, naa-Tan, saa-lo-mxn,
5.23: Daa-witq zyrug naaig zyruq,  zyruq yaag tau kxvq, “maiq tuvq pcv za'g faauj. xij zu'g Wiv mivb Tauj ninb Bua Eei Ga'haaq Gaav yem yenb zrug lomg txib vaang Bx'q ninb Bua.
5.6: huvb tiaj Zauj ninb Eei myenb Zwrtq mivb Tauj ye-lu-saa-lem Bx'q ye-Butg myenb. yem uaq Eei ye-Butg myenb kxvq Buaj Daa-witq, “meib Bua zuvq maiq tu'q pia'g naaiq. lyemb mziv mcvb Eei myenb Zauj zauj Bai Eei myenb haib pun meib Bua zu'g Twij.” ninb Bua Namq taaib, “Daa-witq pia'g maiq tu'q naaiq nxm txvj.”
5.2: zinb Daavg, sau-lo zruj huvb kunq yia Bua Eei zyavb hog, se meib txb i-saa-laa-en myenb pia'g Zwrtq Bx'q Jaaj. zyruq kxvq Buaj meib, ‘meib xij kruj yia Eei pc'g fivj, i-saa-laa-en myenb, Navq kruj pa'ki yuvb Eei myenb nx. meib yaag xij tu'q zruj Lo, kunq ninb Bua.’+”
5.20: Daa-witq zyrug mivb Baa-an-pe-laa-sim. yem naaig ninb Bx'q hivb ninb Bua. ninb kxvq, “zyruq Bx'q paaig yia Eei winb wavq Navq uam Zovj Tov nx.” weig naaiq uaq nxm txvj Zwrtq Buaj heug Baa-an-pe-laa-sim.
5.24: meib Bua yetq haid pcvb kwanb yavb Jauq Eei Qiaj Bwi yem yenb zrug lomg kub vwaaig, xij zu'g kaanq mivb, weig zu'g naaiq pun Ziv zyruq yem meib Bua Eei uaq Daavg mcvj Bx'q fi-li-saa-tia myenb Eei pcvb kwanb.”
5.7: mq paag Daa-witq Bx'q hivb si-on weib wrnq Eei txvj, se Daa-witq Eei zivb.
5.19: Daa-witq zyrug naaig zyruq, “yia xij zu'g mivb Bx'q fi-li-saa-tia myenb fai? meib xij zx'q ninb Bua Jiu pun yia fai?”   zyruq tau ninb, “kunq mivb a'q. weig zu'g yia Dovg haaij zuvq xij zx'q fi-li-saa-tia myenb Jiu pun yem meib Eei puab Diaq.”
5.17: fi-li-saa-tia myenb haid kxvq myenb lovg yrub xn Daa-witq zruj huvb kunq i-saa-laa-en teib puv. fi-li-saa-tia Eei zwavj myenb zyrug Zwrtq taaib lxd Daa-witq, mq paag Daa-witq mwavj haid zyrug Fiag Tauj weib wrnq Eei txvj.
5.11: Tai-la'q Eei huvb, hi-laam, Paaiq teij trug fyenj myenb mivb Daa-witq uaq, yaag fuvj sij-Daa zovb Dyavj Zauj la'pyeib zavg Zauj Dyavb zavg. ninb Bua yaag Zeij nxm huvb ting pun ninb.
5.5: ninb yem he-Bo-lon kunq yu-Daa siag Havb pyenj. ninb yaag yem ye-lu-saa-lem kunq kxmj i-saa-laa-en Zauj yu-Daa faab zyepg faam Havj.
5.9: Daa-witq zyrug mivb yem Jyenq uaq nxm weib wrnq Eei txvj, cvj Zwrtq Buaj heug Daa-witq Eei zivb. ninb Zeij zivb weib kxmj Eei txvj yem min-lo Jiad kxn zruj.
5.4: Daa-witq zruj huvb uaq zang ninb Eei Havb Jeiq tu'q faab zyepg Havj. ninb zweid weig kunq feij zyepg Havj.
5.10: Daa-witq yetg Nxi peiq yetg Nxi henq Jyenq faauj, weig zu'g nrnb Jiaj Eei zyruq Tinb huvb Zauj ninb yem.
5.22: fi-li-saa-tia myenb cvj taaib pun Raanj yem pwavq le-faa-im hxvd.
5.12: Daa-witq zyrug hiuq tu'q zyruq lyepg ninb zruj i-saa- laa-en Eei huvb. Tinb huvb cvj weig ninb Eei pc'g fivj, i-saa-laa-en myenb, pun myenb Taaib Daa-witq Eei kua'q.
5.13: Daa-witq Zwrtq he-Bo-lon mivb, Ga'haaq ninb yem ye-lu-saa-lem cvj lxd auq Zauj Jaab zeib auq yaag tu'q naamb Erud.
5.1: fivb fivj i-saa-laa-en myenb mivb he-Bo-lon, Daa-witq uaq. ninb Bua kxvq, “yia Bua mtaaib Jwavg meib Eei Ryaamb fei.
5.25: Daa-witq zyrug ei Jyenq zyruq Paaiq Eei waag zruj. ninb Bua zyrug yem ke-Baa Bx'q Jyenq fi-li-saa-tia myenb mivb Tauj ke-se.

9.3: huvb tiaj naaig kaaj, “sau-lo Eei trub zov Zxg maaib myenb zevg fai maiq maaib, weig pun yia haib ziuj Tinb huvb Eei en zruj lovj pun ninb Bua fai?” si-Baa kxvq Buaj huvb tiaj, “Zxg maaib taub yo-naa-Taan Eei txn. ninb Eei zauj Bai Eei.”
9.8: me-fi-Bo-setq cvj paaij huvb tiaj kxvq, “yia, meib Eei pru, txvj Navq yetg taub Jub taig. huvb tiaj fuvg Dovg naaig Kxb lyenb yia?”
9.9: huvb tiaj cvj heug sau-lo Eei pru, si-Baa, taaib kxvq Buaj ninb, “ta'faanb sau-lo Zauj ninb Eei trub zov Eei yetg zuvq ka'naaiq yia Jiu pun meib Eei zyruq Eei fun.
9.7: Daa-witq kxvq Buaj ninb, “maiq tuvq kamb Riaj. yia zuvq xij weig meib Eei tia, yo-naa-Taan, zruj lovj pun meib. yia xij zx'q meib Eei ov, sau-lo, Eei yetg zuvq Dau fuvj Rwrnj pun meib. meib yaag tu'q zanb zang Jwavg yia Eei tiab Eang Naavj.”
9.5: huvb tiaj zyrug Paaiq myenb mivb Tauj lo-De-Baa, am-mi-en Eei txn, maa-Ki-le, Eei pyauq.
9.4: huvb tiaj naaig ninb, “ninb yem haaij?” si-Baa kxvq, “ninb yem lo-De-Baa, yem am-mi-en Eei txn, maa-Ki-le, Eei pyauq.”
9.2: yem sau-lo Eei pyauq maaib taub pru, Buaj heug si-Baa. ninb Bua heug ninb taaib Daa-witq uaq. huvb tiaj zyrug naaig ninb, “meib se si-Baa fai?” si-Baa tau, “zeid Eei. yia se si-Baa.”
9.6: sau-lo Eei fun, yo-naa-Taan Eei txn, me-fi-Bo-setq, taaib lxd Daa-witq zyrug Pua'q Fiag Dau paaij. Daa-witq kxvq, “me-fi-Bo-setq aa'b!” me-fi-Bo-setq tau, “yia se meib Eei pru a'q.”
9.13: Navq naaig me-fi-Bo-setq yem ye-lu-saa-lem, weig zu'g ninb zanb zang yem huvb tiaj Eei tiab Eang Naavj. ninb Eei i Jia'q zauj zuvq Bai Eei.
9.12: me-fi-Bo-setq maaib taub txnb faij heug mi-Kaa. yem si-Baa Eei pyauq Eei taub taub myenb yetg zuvq zruj me-fi-Bo-setq Eei pru.
9.11: si-Baa kxvq Buaj huvb tiaj, “ta'faanb yia Eei zyruq, huvb tiaj, Paaiq yia, meib Eei pru, yia, meib Eei pru, zyrug ei Jyenq zruj.” me-fi-Bo-setq zyrug yem huvb tiaj Eei tiab Eang Navq huvb tiaj Eei yetg taub txn nx.
9.1: Daa-witq naaig kaaj, “sau-lo Eei trub zov maaib myenb zevg fai maiq maaib? yia xij weig yo-naa-Taan winb zivb en pun ninb.”
9.10: meib Zauj meib Eei txn, meib Eei pru, xij zu'g Tevj meib Eei zyruq Eei fun zruj livb teig, syru kcvb zwavj taaib weig pun meib Eei zyruq Eei fun maaib Eang hopq. mq paag meib Eei zyruq Eei fun, me-fi-Bo-setq, xij zu'g zanb zang zweid yia Eei tiab Eang Naavj.” si-Baa maaib zyepg Mmd taub txn Zauj Eig zyepg taub pru.

16.18: hu-sai kxvq Buaj apg-saa-lom, “maiq zeid. zyruq Zauj naaiq teij pc'g fivj Zauj i-saa-laa-en Eei zwavj myenb kinq haiq taub, yia zyrug kan uaq taub yaag Zauj ninb yem.
16.8: ib zang zyruq Jaauq win pun meib weig meib yem sau-lo Eei pyauq zov myenb lyrug Zwrtq Eei yetg zuvq Ryaamq, tiq ninb zruj huvb. zyruq yaag zx'q meib Eei kua'q Jiu pun meib Eei txn, apg-saa-lom, mig a'q. mavg maa'b! meib zu'g paaig mig a'q, weig zu'g meib se taij myenb pun Ryaamq lyrug Zwrtq Eei myenb.”
16.3: huvb tiaj cvj naaig, “meib Eei zyruq Eei fun yem haaij?” si-Baa tau, “ninb yem Jyenq ye-lu-saa-lem weig zu'g ninb kxvq, ‘ib Nxi i-saa-laa-en myenb zuvq xij zx'q yia Eei ov Eei kua'q Twij Rwrnj kwei yia.’+”
16.21: aa-hi-To-fen kxvq Buaj apg-saa-lom, “xij zu'g mivb pweij tovb meib Eei tia lyrub Jyenq zuaq huvb ting uaq teij Jaab zeib auq. i-saa- laa-en Eei yetg zuvq myenb zyrug hiuq tu'q meib pun meib Eei tia Rxv meib. ta'faanb kan meib Eei myenb zyrug henq Jyenq faauj.”
16.14: huvb tiaj Zauj kan ninb uaq teij zwavj myenb zyrug Tauj Jx-Dcn Daaib Kruq Revg. ninb Bua zyrug yem naaig hitq Kwrnj.
16.23: yem uaq teij Nxib Eia'g, aa-hi-To-fen Zaavb laavb taaq Eei za'eij se Navq myenb tu'q Tinb huvb Eei waag. lyemb Daa-witq Zauj apg-saa-lom Taaib ninb Zaavb laavb Eei za'eij.
16.6: ninb zx'q la'pyeiq zxi Daa-witq Zauj huvb tiaj Eei zwavj Jyen, maiq kunq pc'g fivj Zauj Bx'q Jaaj henq Eei pcv yem ninb Eei Byaaug mcvj zaaij mcvj.
16.2: huvb tiaj naaig si-Baa, “meib txb naaiq teij ka'naaiq taaib zruj haiq Euvg?” si-Baa tau, “lxb se weig pun huvb tiaj Eei pyauq zov myenb keb. Fuaq Zauj Gaai kxv pyruq se weig kan Eei myenb Eang, a'vung tiuq se weig pun yem teib puvb Waav mau Kruq Eei myenb hopq.”
16.20: apg-saa-lom kxvq Buaj aa-hi-To-fen “Tevj Namq mavg kaaj, yia Bua xij zu'g Navq haiq nx zruj?”
