22.39: yia paaig Revg ninb Bua, Bx'q ninb Bua Tauj ninb Bua maiq haib Jiad sin. ninb Bua Kiv Fiag yia Eei zaub Len.
22.47: “zyruq zyavb Jyenq. xij zu'g Zev peu yia Eei la'pyeiq. xij zu'g Taaib yia Eei Tinb huvb, tovb yia Eei Fruj en Eei la'pyeiq.
22.10: ninb pun luvb Gxi zyrug Fiag taaib, maaib Bwrnb Jia'q yem ninb Eei zaub Diaq.
22.25: weig naaiq, ziuj yia zruj tu'q hxpg, yaag ziuj ninb mavg pwatg yia Zivb Revg,   zyruq winb pun yia.
22.22: weig zu'g yia kan Revg zyruq Eei tod, yia maiq zruj waaig vcvg yia Eei Tinb huvb.
22.42: ninb Bua mavg mq paag maiq maaib haiq taub Fruj ninb Bua. ninb Bua heug zyruq, mq paag ninb maiq tau ninb Bua.
22.15: ninb pwrnq Zwrtq fxvb Zav zruj pun winb wavq Raanj. ninb pxvd Ba'livg, hc'q winb wavq pyauj lung Revg.
22.29: o zyruq aag, meib zruj yia Eei tav. yia Eei Tinb huvb, ziuj yia Mwavj Eei txvj Fav taaib.
22.30: yia pavg meib zyrug haib Bx'q tu'q Junb pcv. yia Kauj yia Eei Tinb huvb haib piu Jiaj zivb laatg.

12.18: Tauj ta'Zyetq Nxi uaq Nxi, uaq taub kub vwaad taig mig a'q. Daa-witq Eei Jyen maiq kaamq Buaj Daa-witq kub vwaad taig mig a'q, weig zu'g ninb Bua Namq, “kub vwaad maiq kcvb taig Eei zyavb hog yia Bua Zauj ninb kxvq mq paag ninb maiq mwavj yia Bua. yia Bua Navq haiq nx haib Buaj ninb kub vwaad taig mig a'q? Riaj ninb haib zruj haiq Euvg hxig ninb kanb mq pei.”
12.8: yia zx'q meib Eei zyruq Eei Jaab tivb Jiu pun meib, yaag zx'q meib Eei zyruq Eei auq pun meib lovg. yia cvj zx'q i-saa-laa-en Zauj yu-Daa myenb Eei zeib fun pun meib. sij kxvq Bua'g naaiq se zo'g haig, yia cvj Jaa Tipq Bua'g naaiq pun meib.
12.3: mq paag uaq taub myenb Jomg myenb maiq maaib haiq Euvg. Kuvj maaib tovb ninb maaid taaib Eei yetg taub pa'ki yuvb zeig txn Navq. ninb txb Lo taaib Zauj ninb yem yaag Zauj ninb Eei fu'Jweiq Lo taaib. uaq taub pa'ki yuvb txn Zauj ninb Bua Jwavg Eang Jwavg hopq. ninb yaag Lxpq Jyenq pweij ninb Eei la'Kwrtq, Navq penj kanb Eei sia'q nx.
12.21: ninb Eei Jyen naaig ninb, “meib Navq naaig zruj eij leid Navq haiq nx? meib Eei kub vwaad yem Eei zyavb hog meib zei maiq Eang haiq Euvg yaag Eyemq. mq paag kub vwaad taig mivb meib Jiad sin taaib Eang Naavj.”
12.14: mq paag laaij meib zruj naaiq teij sig mavg Piaj zyruq Tauj Do'q, meib xij tu'q taaib Eei txn zuvq xij zu'g taig.”
12.23: kub vwaad taig yia fuvg xij zu'g zei? yia cvj haib txb ninb navb taaib fai? yia haib mivb ninb uaq mq paag ninb maiq haib Rwrnj yia naaiq.”
12.6: ninb xij zu'g weig pa'ki yuvb txn pwib pyei kruq weig zu'g ninb Navq naaiq nx zruj yaag maiq maaib Kxb lyenb myenb Eei Hruq.”
12.2: putg zxib myenb maaib pa'ki yuvb Zauj vovb kwanb Zamq Eei.
12.20: Daa-witq zyrug yem Dau Jiad sin taaib Raauj liud sin, Raatq yrub, yeng lwib hruj, pia'g zavg zyruq Eei pyauq paaij. Ga'haaq ninb Rwrnj ninb kanb Eei huvb ting cvj Buaj ninb Eei pru Beng Naavj pun ninb Eang. Beng liud, ninb zyrug Eang a'q.
12.24: Daa-witq zyrug xn ninb Eei auq, Batg-Qe-Baa, Eei Hruq cvj Zauj ninb pweij. ninb zyrug yuvd taub txn. Daa-witq Tevj ninb Zwrtq Buaj heug saa-lo-mxn. zyruq yaag Namq ninb.
12.28: ib zang Toq meib tiug Rxib zevg Fiag Eei pcv taaib lyepg Zyavq weib Jyenq cvj Zaavq naaiq nxm zivb. Riaj yia Zaavq tu'q nx, uaq nxm zivb zyrug xij zu'g kan yia Eei Buaj heug.”
12.7: naa-Tan zyrug kxvq Buaj Daa-witq, “meib se tovb uaq taub myenb a'q. zyruq, i-saa-laa-en myenb Eei Tinb huvb, Navq naaiq nx kxvq. ‘yia lovg yrub xn meib zruj huvb kunq i-saa-laa-en, yaag Fruj meib pyauj Dutq sau-lo Eei puab Diaq.
12.29: Daa-witq zyrug tiug Rxib yetg zuvq pcv Zwrtq mivb lapq-Baa, Bx'q yaag Zaavq tu'q uaq nxm zivb.
12.19: Daa-witq pwatg ninb Eei Jyen Bua kxvq waab sapq zyrug hiuq tu'q kub vwaad taig mig a'q. Daa-witq zyrug naaig kaaj ninb Bua, “kub vwaad taig mig a'q?” ninb Eei Jyen kxvq, “zeid Eei, ninb taig mig a'q.”
12.17: yem ninb Eei pyauq Eei myenb koj taaib sruq ninb Eei ka'Len, xij Ken ninb Jiad sin, mq paag ninb maiq Kavq Jiad sin, yaag maiq Zauj ninb Bua Eang Naavj.
12.31: ninb yaag txb yem zivb ka'Euad Eei myenb Zwrtq taaib, aapq ninb Bua lovg Fruj Zauj Lia'g Ex'q Zauj pruq, yaag aapq ninb Bua zruj niab zun. yem am-mon myenb Eei nxmb nxm zivb ninb Navq naaiq zruj. Ga'haaq Daa-witq Zauj ninb Eei yetg zuvq pcv Rwrnj ye-lu-saa-lem zivb mig a'q.
12.30: ninb mwrnj ninb Bua Eei huvb tiaj Eei Jyemb nivq. naaiq nxm Jyemb nivq se Eig zyepg yetq Jxib Jyem yaag tivj Jyenq la'pyeib Jaaij. myenb zx'q naaiq nxm nivq taaib Dovj Jyenq Daa-witq Eei mGxvq. Daa-witq yaag Zaavq tu'q yem zivb Eei ka'naaiq za'kevb Zamq! haig.
12.27: yo-aapg Paaiq trug fyenj myenb mivb Buaj Daa-witq, “yia Bx'q lapq-Baa zivb, zx'q tu'q zivb Eei uamb zivq a'q.
12.11: “zyruq Navq naaiq kxvq, ‘yia zuvq xij pun meib zu'g ze'g naang yem meib kanb Eei pyauq zov myenb Zwrtq. yia xij txv Jyenq meib zx'q meib Eei auq pun kanb taub myenb luvb Nxi zang Fav Eei zyavb hog Zauj ninb Bua pweij.
12.5: Daa-witq Qiaj! Jiad haig uaq taub putg zxib myenb zyrug kxvq Buaj naa-Tan, “yia zyavq Jyenq yetg liud zyavb Eei zyruq kxvq, Navq naaiq nx zruj, uaq taub myenb zig tu'q taig.
12.9: meib weig haiq tiug mavg Piaj zyruq Eei waag, ziuj ninb mavg, zruj waaig sig. meib lovg Ru'g Daauq taij hitq-Tai myenb, u-li-aa, se meib pun am-mon myenb Eei Ru'g Daauq taij ninb zyrug lovg ninb Eei auq zruj meib kanb Eei auq.
12.16: Daa-witq weig uaq taub txn Jrub Tinb huvb. ninb zei maiq Eang haiq Euvg, pia'g ninb Eei pyauq zyavb mwrnd pweij ka'Diaq Dau.
12.4: “maaib taub Kc'q myenb taaib Tauj putg zxib myenb Eei pyauq, mq paag putg zxib myenb siaq maiq tu'q zx'q taub ninb kanb Eei pa'ki yuvb fai vovb Beng pun uaq taub Kc'q myenb Eang. taauj Rwrnj, ninb zx'q uaq taub myenb Jomg myenb Eei pa'ki yuvb zeig Beng pun Kc'q myenb Eang.”
12.10: Navq naaig meib Eei trub zov yetg liud xij zu'g maaib Ru'g Daauq taij Eei sig, laaij meib mavg Piaj yia, zx'q hitq-Tai myenb, u-li-aa, Eei auq zruj meib kanb Eei auq.
12.22: Daa-witq kxvq, “kub vwaad Zxg yem Eei zyavb hog yia zei maiq Eang haiq Euvg. yia Namq, ‘haiq taub haib hiuq tu'q? Riaj zyruq haib Kxb lyenb yia, pun kub vwaad maiq taig.’
12.12: meib pivj Jyenq zruj naaiq teij sig mq paag yia xij yem luvb Nxi zang Fav Eei zyavb hog txv Jyenq i-saa-laa-en Eei zwavj myenb zruj.’+”
12.15: kxvq liud, naa-Tan zyrug Rwrnj pyauq mig a'q. zyruq pun u-li-aa Eei auq yuvd pun Daa-witq uaq taub txn putq pcvg Niaq.
12.13: Daa-witq kxvq Buaj naa-Tan, “yia paamd zwid txvg zyruq. ” naa-Tan kxvq Buaj Daa-witq, “zyruq kwavg meib Eei zwid, meib zyrug maiq zu'g taig.
12.1: zyruq Paaiq naa-Tan mivb lxd Daa-witq. mivb Tauj Daa-witq uaq naa-Tan kxvq, “maaib nxm muvq maaib i taub myenb. maaib taub putq zxib, maaib taub Jomg.
12.26: yo-aapg Bx'q am-mon myenb Eei lapq-Baa zivb yaag zx'q tu'q huvb tiaj Eei kivb zivb mig a'q.
12.25: weig zu'g zyruq Namq ninb, ninb lovg trug waag myenb, naa-Tan, Tevj ninb Zwrtq Buaj heug, ye-Di-Di-yaa.

15.18: huvb Eei zwavj Jyen mivb Daavg huvb tiaj. Ke-le-Ti myenb Zauj Pe-letq myenb yetg zuvq cvj Zauj kan ninb uaq teij lua'g pc'q taub katg myenb Jiaj Daavg huvb tiaj.
15.8: weig zu'g yia, meib Eei pru, yem si-lia teib puv, ke-su muvq, uaq zang yia lcvd vcvg waag kxvq, ‘sij kxvq zyruq txb yia yem ye-lu-saa-lem Rwrnj, yia zuvq xij yem he-Bo-lon paaij ninb.’+”
15.33: Daa-witq kxvq Buaj ninb, “sij kxvq meib kan yia mivb, meib Tevj maiq tu'q yia.
15.3: apg-saa-lom cvj kxvq Buaj ninb, “meib kxvq Eei se hxpg Eei, lovj Eei, mq paag huvb tiaj maiq tu'q Paaiq haiq taub mwavj meib Eei sig.”
15.32: Daa-witq Tauj Bovb nivq, zavg Tinb huvb Eei txvj, maaib taub aan-Ki myenb, hu-sai, taaib yem ninb Eei Ra'Myen. hu-sai Eei lwib hruj petq huq yaag maaib niab Buv yem ninb Eei mGxvq.
15.21: mq paag itg-Tai tau huvb tiaj, “yia zyavq Jyenq yetg liud zyavb Jyenq Eei zyruq yaag yem yia Eei zyruq, huvb tiaj, Eei Ra'Myen lcvd waag kxvq, yia Eei zyruq, huvb tiaj, yem haaij, maiq kunq navb fai taig, yia, meib Eei pru, zuvq yem uaq a'q.”
15.35: saaj-Dokg sai myenb Zauj aa-Bi-yaa-Taa sai myenb Zauj meib yem naaig maiq zeid? meib yem huvb ting ka'Euad mwavj haid haiq Euvg xij zu'g Buaj saaj-Dokg Zauj aa-Bi-yaa-Taa.
15.14: Daa-witq kxvq Buaj Zauj ninb yem ye-lu-saa-lem Eei yetg zuvq Jyen, “Bua xij zu'g pyauj. maiq zei c'q, Bua maiq haib pyauj maiq Dutq apg-saa-lom. xij zu'g kaanq Jyenq mivb, Riaj ninb haib syepg syepq Eei zung zaaig hxig Bua, yaag lovg Ru'g Daauq taij yem zivb Eei myenb.”
15.23: zwavj myenb Jiaj Eei zyavb hog, pwrnb teig myenb yetg zuvq puvb siv puvb Qiaj Eei Eyemq Bwi. huvb tiaj Jiaj Kitg-lon Do'q. zwavj myenb Jiaj mivb yaag huvj Jyenq teib puvb Waav Eei Jauq mivb.
15.6: apg-saa-lom Navq naaiq nx zruj pun taaib lxd huvb tiaj tunj sig Eei taub taub i-saa-laa-en myenb. apg-saa-lom zyrug Duaq tu'q i-saa-laa-en myenb Eei Hruq kan ninb.
15.34: mq paag sij kxvq meib Rwrnj zivb mivb Buaj apg-saa-lom, ‘o huvb tiaj aag, yia xij zruj meib Eei pru. zinb Daavg yia zruj meib Eei tia Eei pru. ib zang yia xij Navq uaq nx zruj meib Eei pru.’ Navq naaig meib haib pun aa-hi-To-fen Zaavb laavb Eei waag Dxtq.
15.2: apg-saa-lom Dxmb Dxm Jiad sin Ryruq Eei mivb sruq Jyenq zivb kcvb Daavg Eei Jaub Len. ta'faanb haiq taub myenb maaib sig xij Toq huvb tiaj tunj, apg-saa-lom zyrug heug uaq taub yaag naaig ninb, “meib yem haiq nxm muvq taaib?” uaq taub zyrug tau, “yia se yem i-saa-laa-en teib puv Eei yetg fivj myenb.”
15.36: ninb Bua Eei i taub txn yem naaig. maaib saaj-Dokg Eei txn, aa-hi-maa-atg, Zauj aa-Bi-yaa-Taa Eei txn, yo-naa-Taan. Navq naaig, ta'faanb meib Bua mwavj haid haiq Euvg, xij zu'g Paaiq naaiq teij i taub taaib Buaj yia.”
15.20: meib taaib Tauj maiq kcvb laub. yia ib Nxi xij zu'g pun meib kan yia Jiaj naaiq Jiaj uaq. yia kanb zuvq maiq hiuq tu'q xij mivb haaij. kunq Rwrnj a'q, yaag txb Jyenq meib Eei Jwavg fivj myenb. Toq zyruq pun Ziv ninb zyepg zua'q Eei Namq meib yaag zyepg zua'q Eei zruj pun meib.”
15.24: saaj-Dokg yaag yem uaq, Zauj kcv Tinb huvb Eei lcvd vcvg waag faav Eei le-wi myenb yetg zuvq. ninb Bua zx'q Tinb huvb Eei lcvd vcvg waag faav an Fiag. aa-Bi-yaa-Taa faauj taaib zuaq zwavj pc'g fivj yem zivb Zwrtq taaib Jiaj Revg.
15.28: yia yem teib puvb Waav Jiaj Daaib Eei Jaub prug zuaq meib fuvj fyenj taaib pun yia hiuq.”
15.7: Jiaj liud pyei Havj, apg-saa-lom kxvq Buaj huvb tiaj, “Toq pun yia mivb he-Bo-lon Jaauq suv yia lcvd pun zyruq Eei vcvg waag.
15.29: saaj-Dokg Zauj aa-Bi-yaa-Taa zyrug kcv Tinb huvb Eei lcvd vcvg waag faav Rwrnj ye-lu-saa-lem. ninb Bua yaag yem Jyenq uaq.
15.19: huvb tiaj kxvq Buaj katg myenb, itg-Tai, “meib weig haiq tiug kan yia Bua taaib? kunq Rwrnj mivb Zauj syavb huvb yem. meib se kanb fivj myenb, leib Gxi meib kanb Eei teib puv.
15.17: huvb tiaj zyrug Zwrtq Jauq, zwavj myenb yaag kan Jyenq mivb. Tauj Ga'haaq laai uaq nxm pyauq ninb Bua tivb Fiag.
15.31: maaib myenb taaib Buaj Daa-witq, “aa-hi-To-fen yem Jyenq Tevj apg-saa-lom Byenq sig uaq kwanb myenb.” Daa-witq zyrug tauj kauj kxvq, “o zyruq aag, Toq pun aa-hi-To-fen Tevj Zaavb laavb Eei waag Tiuq penj Vovj Eei sig.”
15.30: mq paag Daa-witq faauj ka'lanq Bov, yetg ping faauj, yetg ping Eyemq. ninb maiq taapg heb, yaag pwav Jyenq mGxvq. kan ninb uaq teij zwavj myenb yaag pwav Jyenq mGxvq, yetg ping faauj, yetg ping Eyemq Jyenq mivb.
15.27: huvb tiaj cvj kxvq Buaj saaj-Dokg sai myenb, “meib se trug waag myenb maiq zeid? kunq pcvb xn Eei Rwrnj zivb, meib Zauj aa-Bi-yaa-Taa txb meib Eei txn, aa-hi-maa-atg, Zauj aa-Bi-yaa-Taa Eei txn, yo-naa-Taan.
15.11: maaib Eig pc'q taub yem ye-lu-saa-lem Eei myenb kan Jyenq ninb mivb. myenb Zivq ninb Bua mivb mq paag ninb Bua maiq hiuq tu'q naaiq teij Jauq.
15.5: sij kxvq maaib haiq taub myenb taaib fatq, paaij apg-saa-lom, apg-saa-lom zyrug suv puad pcv Jyenq ninb, zom ninb Eei Myen.
15.9: huvb tiaj kxvq, “meib kunq pcvb xn Eei mivb a'q.” ninb zyrug mivb he-Bo-lon mig a'q.
15.16: huvb tiaj Zauj ninb Eei yetg pyauq myenb zyrug Zwrtq Jauq a'q. Kuvj lyrub zyepg taub Jaab zeib auq kruj huvb ting Navq.
15.37: Daa-witq Eei lob kcv txig, hu-sai, zyrug pia'g zivb mivb. uaq zang apg-saa-lom Javb Jav pia'g ye-lu-saa-lem.
15.4: apg-saa-lom cvj Jaa Jruj waag kxvq, “feij tu'q yia yem i-saa-laa-en tu'q zruj tunj sig Jyen. haiq taub maaib sig fai koj Eei Jauq yia zyrug pcvb fim Eei Tevj ninb tunj.”
15.10: mq paag apg-saa-lom Paaiq trug fyenj myenb pivj Jyenq mivb kxmj i-saa-laa-en teib puv Eei fivb fivj myenb. ninb Bua kxvq, “meib Bua yetq haid Jxv Eei Qiaj Bwi, xij zu'g kxvq, ‘apg-saa-lom yem he-Bo-lon zruj huvb aaq lo'b!’+”
15.22: Daa-witq kxvq Buaj itg-Tai, “uaq Euvg, meib kunq mivb Daavg a'q.” katg myenb, itg-Tai, zyrug txb Jyenq kan ninb uaq teij myenb, lyemb tomb myenb Zauj fu'Jweiq, mivb a'q.
15.12: apg-saa-lom fovg hxg ziag Eei zyavb hog, ninb Paaiq myenb mivb Buaj Tevj Daa-witq Zaavb laavb uaq taub ki-lon myenb, aa-hi-To-fen, yem ninb Eei pwrnb zivb, ki-lon, taaib. faanq Eei Jauq kunq zruj kunq Lo. kan apg-saa-lom Eei myenb kunq zruj kunq Zamq.
15.15: huvb tiaj Eei Jyen kxvq Buaj huvb tiaj, “yia Bua Eei zyruq, huvb tiaj, tivg zruj haiq Euvg yia Bua zyrug ei Jyenq zruj.”
15.13: maaib taub trug fyenj myenb taaib Buaj Daa-witq, “i-saa-laa-en myenb Eei Hruq pia'g apg-saa-lom mig a'q.”
15.1: Ga'haaq apg-saa-lom weig kanb liug leid maab Zia Zauj maad, cvj maaib Mmd zyepg taub myenb Tiuj mivb Daavg.
15.26: mq paag sij kxvq zyruq kxvq, ‘yia maiq hxpg Hruq meib,’ yia yem naaiq, sweib ninb zruj ziuj ninb pwatg hxpg Eei.”
15.25: huvb tiaj yaag kxvq Buaj saaj-Dokg, “xij zu'g kcv Tinb huvb Eei lcvd vcvg waag faav Rwrnj zivb mivb. sij kxvq ziuj zyruq mavg yia zruj tu'q hxpg nx, ninb xij txb yia Rwrnj taaib tu'q pwatg lcvd vcvg waag faav Zauj zyruq yem Eei txvj.

13.18: am-non Eei pru zyrug zung Taa-maa Zwrtq mivb cvj sxn Jyenq kcvb. uaq zang Taa-maa zu'q Jyenq lwib Daauq. lwib mweid yaag Daauq Eei Navq maiq kcvb txv Jaa Eei huvb sia'q zu'q nx.
13.8: Taa-maa zyrug mivb ninb Eei kxj, am-non, Eei pyauq, Tauj am-non pweij Jyenq Eei txvj. ninb zyrug yem am-non Eei Ra'Myen zx'q Qruq zyavj Eei Bwrnq Zaij taaib zaav.
13.33: Navq naaiq, Toq yia Eei zyruq, huvb tiaj, maiq tuvq Hruq Waav laaig huvb tiaj Eei yetg zuvq txn zu'g taig Revg. Kuvj am-non kanb Du'g taub zu'g taij taig Navq.”
13.3: am-non maaib taub lob kcv txig, Buaj heug yo-naa-Dapg, se Daa-witq Eei kxj, si-me-haa, Eei txn. naaiq taub myenb kwai haig.
13.32: mq paag Daa-witq Eei kxj, si-me-haa Eei txn, yo-naa-Dapg, kxvq, “Toq yia Eei zyruq maiq tuvq laaig ninb Bua taij Revg uaq teij myenb lunj myenb, se huvb tiaj Eei yetg zuvq txn, weig zu'g Kuvj am-non kanb taig Navq. yem am-non Zaa apg-saa-lom Eei muag, Taa-maa, uaq Nxi, apg-saa-lom Jiad Hruq taij am-non.
13.21: Daa-witq huvb haid naaiq teij yetg zuvq sig ninb Qiaj Jiad! haig.
13.35: yo-naa-Dapg kxvq Buaj huvb tiaj, “mavg maa'b! huvb tiaj Eei txn Bua taaib a'q. Navq yia, meib Eei pru, kxvq nx, za'kevb Navq uaq nx.”
13.14: mq paag am-non maiq mwavj. ninb Eei Qa'q kaub henq, ninb zyrug Zaa ninb Eei muag, Taa-maa.
13.23: Jiaj liud i Havj, apg-saa-lom yem Baa-an-haa-so, nitq e-faa-im, Japq pa'ki yuvb Eei pyei. apg-saa-lom Zivq huvb tiaj Eei yetg zuvq txn Zauj Jyenq ninb mivb.
13.6: am-non zyrug pweij Jyenq Zruj zaaj laaig putq pcvg. huvb tiaj taaib mavg ninb Eei zyavb hog ninb kxvq Buaj huvb tiaj, “Toq pun yia Eei muag, Taa-maa, taaib yem yia Eei Ra'Myen zruj i nxm Fuaq, pun ninb kanb txb taaib pun yia Eang.”
13.34: mq paag apg-saa-lom pyauj. syruq kcv uaq taub myenb lunj myenb Zau Myen mavg pwatg myenb Zamq kan Jyenq ho-lo-naa-im, Bov ka'Len uaq tiub Jauq taaib.
13.2: am-non pa'la'g Namq kau, Hruq Raub tu'q Kruq, zuvq penj pcvg mig a'q. weig zu'g Taa-maa se maiq pweij Jiaj txn Eei sia'q, am-non haid maiq nxig tu'q Taa-maa.
13.36: ninb yetq kxvq setq waag Navq, huvb tiaj Eei txn pia'g taaib yaag Qa'q Eyemq. huvb tiaj Zauj ninb Eei zwavj pru yaag puvb siv puvb Qiaj Eei Eyemq.
13.20: Taa-maa Eei kxj, apg-saa-lom, naaig ninb, “meib Eei kxj, am-non, Zauj liud meib fai? yia Eei muag aag, maiq tuvq kxvq a'q. ninb zruj meib Eei kxj. maiq tuvq Namq Zamq.” Taa-maa zyrug Raub Raub Do'g Do'g Eei yem ninb Eei kxj, apg-saa-lom, Eei pyauq.
13.24: ninb mivb lxd huvb tiaj yaag kxvq, “yia, meib Eei pru, maaib myenb Japq pa'ki yuvb Eei pyei. Toq huvb tiaj Zauj huvb Eei zwavj Jyen Zauj yia, meib Eei pru, mivb.”
13.28: apg-saa-lom Paaiq ninb Eei pru, “zuaq Jyenq mavg am-non hopq tiuq Zamq Fyenb yrub a'q, yia haiq zang kxvq, ‘taij am-non a'q,’ kunq taij ninb taig. maiq tuvq kamb Riaj. se yia Paaiq meib Bua zruj maiq zeid? xij zu'g taamq Lo yaag henq.”
13.7: Daa-witq zyrug Paaiq myenb mivb Buaj Taa-maa, “mivb meib Eei kxj, am-non, Eei pyauq liug leid ka'naaiq pun ninb Eang.”
13.29: apg-saa-lom Eei pru zyrug ei Jyenq ninb Paaiq Eei waag zruj pun am-non. huvb tiaj zevg Fiag Eei yetg zuvq txn Jiad sin taaib, kx'g myenb faauj kx'g myenb Eei lxb keb Jyenq pyauj.
13.19: Taa-maa zx'q saaiq Yaamj Jyenq mGxvq yaag petq ninb zu'q Jyenq maaib lwib mweid Daauq Eei lwi, lovg puad pwav Jyenq mGxvq yetg ping mivb yetg ping Eyemq Bwi Eei.
13.17: ninb zyrug heug ninb kanb Eei pru taaib Buaj ninb, “zung naaiq taub msia'q txn Zwrtq naaiq mivb, kwrn Jyenq kcvb, sxn Jyenq.”
13.38: apg-saa-lom pyauj mivb ke-su, yem uaq pua Havj.
13.31: huvb tiaj sruq Jiad taaib petq ninb Eei lwib hruj yaag pweij ka'Diaq Dau. sruq Jyenq huvb Eei ka'Len uaq teij Jyen yaag petq ninb Bua Eei lwib hruj.
13.30: ninb Bua Zxg yem Daamb Jauq uaq zang maaib waag Tauj Daa-witq uaq kxvq, “apg-saa-lom taij Revg huvb Eei txn, maiq zevg yetg taub.”
13.27: mq paag apg-saa-lom Qa'q Toq, huvb tiaj zyrug Gxi Rwib pun am-non Zauj huvb Eei yetg zuvq txn mivb.
13.11: mq paag txb Fuaq mivb pun ninb Eei kxj Eang uaq zang, ninb Eei kxj zx'q Jyenq ninb cvj kxvq Buaj ninb, “yia Eei muag aa'b! taaib Zauj yia pweij maa'b!”
13.5: yo-naa-Dapg kxvq Buaj ninb, “meib xij zu'g pweij Jyenq Zruj zaaj laaig putq pcvg. meib Eei tia taaib mavg meib Eei zyavb hog xij zu'g kxvq Buaj ninb, ‘Toq Buaj yia Eei muag, Taa-maa, txb Eang hopq taaib pun yia Eang. ninb xij zu'g taaib yem yia Eei Ra'Myen liug leid pun yia tu'q pwatg ninb. Ga'haaq ninb kanb Eei puad xij zu'g txb taaib pun yia Eang.’+”
13.9: ninb yaag yem am-non Eei Ra'Myen zx'q Fuaq Zwrtq taaib mq paag am-non maiq Eang. ninb kxvq Buaj zwavj myenb, “Zwrtq Revg mivb!” ninb Bua zyrug Zwrtq Revg mig a'q.
13.16: Taa-maa kxvq Buaj ninb, “yia Eei kxj aa'b! maiq tuvq Navq naaiq zruj. zung yia Zwrtq se txvg kaub Niaq meib zruj pun yia Eei.” mq paag am-non maiq mwavj.
13.37: apg-saa-lom pyauj mivb Tauj ke-su Eei huvb, am-mi-hutq, Eei txn, Tan-mai, uaq. mq paag Daa-witq huvb Nxib Nxi weig ninb Eei txn Raub.
13.39: huvb tiaj Javj haig, xij pwatg apg-saa-lom, weig zu'g ninb Raub am-non zu'g taig Eei Jauq zo'g Jyenq Fiag.
13.4: ninb kxvq Buaj am-non, “huvb Eei txn aa'b! meib weig haiq tiug yetg Dxm peiq yetg Dxm Raub? meib maiq Buaj yia fai?” am-non tau, “yia Namq yia Eei yrud, apg-saa-lom, Eei muag, Taa-maa.”
13.10: am-non kxvq Buaj Taa-maa, “txb Fuaq pia'g yia Eei ken weig pun yia tu'q Eang meib Eei puad txb taaib Eei ka'naaiq.” Taa-maa zyrug txb ninb zruj taaib Eei Fuaq pia'g ken mivb pun ninb Eei kxj, am-non, Eang.
13.22: mq paag apg-saa-lom maiq Zauj am-non kxvq haiq Euvg waag, maiq kunq lovj fai Zyruq, weig zu'g apg-saa-lom Rxv am-non laaij am-non Zaa ninb Eei muag.
13.12: Taa-maa kxvq, “yia Eei kxj aa'b! maiq tu'q lx'g. maiq tuvq aapq yia. yem i-saa-laa-en myenb Bu'Dovj maiq zruj naaiq teij sig. maiq tuvq zruj naaiq teij x'q sig maa'b!
13.15: Ga'haaq am-non kevb! Rxv haig Taa-maa, zuvq Rxv kaub Zamq ninb zinb Daavg Namq uaq zang. am-non kxvq, “Jiad sin taaib, mivb a'q.”
13.13: yia kanb c'q, Navq naaig zu'g Eaiq, yia Eei Myen maiq lamb an txvj a'q. meib kanb yaag zu'g yem i-saa-laa-en myenb Bu'Dovj penj ka'naaib Vovj. weig naaiq meib hxpg zu'g Toq huvb tiaj, Namq taaib ninb maiq vcvg puvj yia pun meib.”
13.1: Daa-witq Eei txn, apg-saa-lom, maaib taub muag zyavb tu'q Rweig haig. ninb Eei Buaj heug Taa-maa. Daa-witq Eei kanb taub txn, am-non, Namq Taa-maa.
13.26: apg-saa-lom zyrug kxvq, “maiq mivb nx, Toq Gxi Rwib pun yia Eei kxj, am-non, Zauj Jyenq yia Bua mivb.” huvb tiaj naaig, “ninb weig haiq tiug xij zu'g Zauj meib mivb?”
13.25: mq paag huvb tiaj kxvq Buaj apg-saa-lom, “yia Eei txn aa'b! Bua maiq zu'g mivb Revg. Riaj Kuvj la'Eauq meib Navq.” apg-saa-lom Qa'q Toq, huvb tiaj Zxg maiq lcvd mivb, mq paag ninb pwav waag pun apg-saa-lom.

1.18: Daa-witq heug zx'q naaiq tiub Ruv Faauj yu-Daa myenb. Ruv fiaq Jyenq yaa-saa Eei sru. Ruv kxvq,
1.8: “ninb naaig yia, ‘meib haiq taub?’ “yia tau, ‘yia se aa-maa-lekq myenb.’
1.3: Daa-witq naaig ninb, “meib yem haaij taaib?” ninb tau “yia yem i-saa-laa-en myenb Eei Zyavq pyauj Zwrtq taaib.”
1.21: “kin-Bo-aa Bovb aiq aag, Toq maiq tuvq maaib Byuvg fai maaib Byuvb swiq Fruj meib. Toq maiq tuvq pun meib Eei livb teig Zwrtq kcvb zwavj zruj fovg hxg Eei ka'naaiq, weig zu'g myenb henq myenb Eei Txvb paaib yem uaq zu'g maaib wij. sau-lo Eei Txvb paaib maiq tu'q cvj Raatq yrub.
1.14: Daa-witq kxvq, “meib weig haiq tiug maiq kamb Riaj suv puad taij zyruq lovg yrub xn taaib Eei myenb?”
1.23: “sau-lo Zauj yo-naa-Taan aa'b! myenb Namq yaag xij Eei. maiq kunq zyavb fai taig, ninb Bua maiq leib Gxi txig. ninb Bua i taub kaub syepq tomb Jaavq, yaag kaub henq Jiaj syenb.
1.6: trug fyenj Eei myenb lunj myenb kxvq, “yia Javb Jav Tauj kin-Bo-aa Bov, pwatg sau-lo Baapq Jyenq ninb Eei Zav. Bx'q Jaaj Zia Zauj keb maad pcv zung Jyenq ninb taaib fatq a'q.
1.2: Tauj ta'faam Nxi, maaib taub myenb yem sau-lo Eei Dopg liub Zyavq taaib. ninb zu'q Jyenq lwib hrub huq. mGxvq yaag Yaamj Jyenq niab Buv. ninb taaib Tauj Daa-witq Eei Ra'Myen Pua'q Fiag Dau paaij.
1.20: “yem katg maiq tuvq kxvq naaiq teij sig, yaag maiq tuvq yem atg-Ke-lon Eei heib hxvg zunb. Riaj fi-li-saa-tia myenb Eei sia'q Fyenb yrub, Raub heij maiq Jiaj kaatq Eei leid uaq teij myenb Eei sia'q xnb lx'g.
1.24: “i-saa-laa-en Eei sia'q aa'b! xij zu'g weig sau-lo Raub Eyemq. ninb pun meib Bua zu'q setq si'q Eyemd Eei Zyrub tung, pun meib Bua Eei lwib hruj maaib Jyem Eei syrub setq zxv.
1.7: ninb Win Rwrnj mavg pwatg yia zyrug Qa'q heug yia. yia kxvq, ‘yia yem naaiq og.’
1.19: “o i-saa-laa-en myenb aag, meib Eei pyeiq zeiq yem meib Eei txvj zu'g taij taig mig a'q. meib Eei myenb henq myenb taig mig a'q.
1.17: Daa-witq weig sau-lo Zauj sau-lo Eei txn, yo-naa-Taan, paauj naaiq tiub Raub Eyemq Eei Ruv.
1.27: “myenb henq myenb Kiv Fiag taig mig a'q. Bx'q Jaaj Eei ua'g king yaag zu'g myetg mig a'q.”
1.11: Daa-witq zyrug petq ninb Eei lwi. kan ninb uaq teij myenb yaag fib Navq Eei zruj.
1.5: Daa-witq naaig trug fyenj Eei myenb lunj myenb, “meib Navq haiq nx hiuq tu'q sau-lo Zauj ninb Eei txn, yo-naa-Taan, taig?”
1.9: “ninb kxvq, ‘Toq meib taaib sruq yia ka'Len taij yia taig, weig zu'g yia zu'g syav, mun haig, mq paag yia Zxg maiq taig.’
1.16: Daa-witq kxvq Buaj ninb, “meib taij myenb Eei zwid meib kanb xij zu'g Daamb txv, weig zu'g meib kanb Eei Rwib zruj zxvb zevj kxvq, ‘yia taij zyruq lovg yrub xn taaib Eei myenb.’+”
1.4: Daa-witq cvj naaig ninb, “Toq meib Buaj yia, sig Navq haiq nx?” ninb tau kxvq, “pc'g fivj yem Bx'q Jaaj ka'Euad pyauj, yaag maaib myenb zu'g taij taig Zamq. sau-lo Zauj ninb Eei txn, yo-naa-Taan, yaag taig mig a'q.”
1.10: “yia zyrug mivb sruq Jyenq ninb Eei ka'Len taij taig ninb weig zu'g yia hiuq tivg ninb Kiv Fiag nx, maiq haib navb a'q. yia zyrug mwrnj ninb Eei huvb nivq yaag zx'q puad Eei Jyemb txb taaib Jiu pun meib, yia Eei zyruq.”
1.22: yem zu'g taij taig Eei myenb Eei Ryaamq, yem myenb henq myenb Eei Mei, yo-naa-Taan Eei Jwavb zinj Eei fxvb Zav maiq taauj Gaav, sau-lo Eei Ru'g Daauq yaag maiq zeid pc'g pc'g Rwrnj.
1.12: ninb Bua Raub Eyemq, zei maiq Eang haiq Euvg Tauj luvb maanb Mwavj. ninb Bua Navq naaiq nx zruj weig sau-lo Zauj ninb Eei txn, yo-naa-Taan, yaag weig zyruq Eei pc'g fivj Zauj i-saa-laa-en myenb Eei zeib fun zu'g Ru'g Daauq taij taig.
1.15: Daa-witq zyrug heug yetg taub yem uaq Eei myenb lunj myenb taaib, kxvq Buaj ninb, “meib mivb taij ninb maa'b!” ninb zyrug taij taig uaq taub myenb.
1.13: Daa-witq naaig trug fyenj uaq taub myenb lunj myenb, “meib yem haaij taaib?” ninb tau, “yia se yem teib puv, kanb fivj myenb Eei txn, se aa-maa-lekq myenb.”
1.1: sau-lo kwei seij mig a'q. Ga'haaq Daa-witq mivb taij aa-maa-lekq myenb Rwrnj taaib, ninb yem sikg-laakq hitq i Nxi.
1.26: yia Eei kxj, yo-naa-Taan aag, yia weig meib Hruq mun. yia kevb Namq haig, Javj haig meib. meib Namq yia Eei Jauq za'kevb Bua'g hxvb haig, zuvq Jiaj Daavg msia'q txn Namq Eei.
1.25: “myenb henq myenb yem Bx'q Jaaj Zyavq Kiv Fiag taig mig a'q. yo-naa-Taan yem i-saa-laa-en Lav Eei txvj zu'g taij taig.
